loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 28 years old and married to Benson. They have been blessed with two school-going children. She has been running her quarry business alongside her retail shop for four years, making a monthly profit of KES 15,000. This is her first loan. She has been loaned KES 20,000, which she plans to use to purchase an extra quarrying site.

With the anticipated profit, she plans to expand her shop business. In the near future, she plans to purchase another quarry site that's vast enough to make huge profits.

loans.use: to purchase an extra quarrying site

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis Enrique ha trabajado como independiente desde hace algunos años lo que le ha permitido incluso vincular laboralmente a su familia con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida. Este emprendedor cuenta con un restaurante en el municipio de El Carmen de Víboral al oriente de Antioquia y en el futuro espera crecer para generar empleos a personas de su comunidad. 

Luis, necesita de un préstamo para comprar una moto para realizar domicilios y así incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Luis Enrique has worked as independently for some years and that has allowed him to bring his family into his work with the objective of improving their quality of life.  This entrepreneur has a restaurant in the town of El Carmen de Viboral in the east of Antioquia.  In the future he hopes to grow so that he can give work to people from his community.

Luis needs a loan to buy a motorbike to make home deliveries and thus increase his sales.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to make home deliveries

loans.name: Alba Nury

texts.es:
Después de trabajar durante algunos años en un almacén y motivada por tener su propio negocio, Alba Nury con sus ahorros empezó a vender mercancía entre tenderos conocidos, actualmente se dedica a esta labor y gracias a ella obtiene sus propios ingresos, los cuales kle sirven para aportar al cubrimiento de los gastos del hogar. 

En el futuro esta emprendedora sueña con ampliar su mercado y tener cada vez más clientes con el fin de crecer su negocio, por ahora necesita de un préstamo para adquirir mercancía y así aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
After working for a number of years in a store, and motivated to have her own business, Alba Nury started to sell merchandise among some well-known shopkeepers using her own savings.  This is the work that she is doing now, and thanks to this business she generates her own income, which she uses to contribute to the household expenses.

In the future, this enterprising woman dreams of expanding her business and gaining more and more customers over time.  For now, she needs a loan so that she can acquire merchandise and in this way increase her income.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise

loans.name: Ousseynou

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié et père de 5 filles et d'un garçon.Les quatre filles sont à l'école.Sa principale activité est la location de planches en bois pour le coffrage des bâtiments et la location de baches.Il a démarré cette activité depuis 1999 et compte aujourd'hui 173 planches et 4 bâches.Il entretient sa femmes et ses enfants avec les revenus de ses locations.Afin d'acheter une cinquième bâche, il sollicite un pret de 250 000F auprès de l'UIMCEC.Son ambition est de construire une maison sur son terrain acquis avec ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This borrower is married man, the father of five girls and a boy. Four girls are in school. His main work involves the renting of boards for formwork in the building industry and the renting of tarps. He started this business in 1999, and today he has 173 boards and 4 tarps. He takes care of his wife and children with the income on rents. 

In order to buy a fifth tarp, he is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs from U-IMCEC. His ambition is to build a house on his plot of land acquired with his savings.

loans.use: to buy a tarp

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase provisions (soap, chloride, tissue cartons) for her business

loans.name: Paul Nganga

texts.en:
Paul is a married man with three children with ages ranging from 1.5 to 14 years. He describes himself as outgoing. 

He operates a furniture workshop where he sells beds, wardrobes, tables, sofas and wall units. His customers include individuals and cooperatives. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the lack of materials.

He will use the loan to buy fitting machines for his furniture workshop. He hopes to one day be able to expand the workshop to use complex machines.

loans.use: To pay for fitting machines

loans.name: Sandra Bibiana

texts.es:
Sandra es una emprendedora que siempre quiso trabajar como independiente y aportar a su hogar con sus ingresos, es así como después de estudiar algunas cosas propias del oficio de la belleza, se dedica a realizar manicure a domicilio. 

Teniendo en cuenta que Sandra también tienen conocimientos de corte y cepillado, tinturas, entre otros, esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar algunos utensilios que le permitan prestar este tipo de servicios y así mejorar sus ingresos. 

En el futuro, Sandra espera tener su propio local con una Sala de Belleza que ofrezca todos los servicios propios de estos negocios.
texts.en:
Sandra is an entrepreneur who always wanted to work independently and contribute to her household with her income, and so after studying several things about the beauty profession, she decided to provide manicures from her home.  

Given that Sandra also has knowledge of cuts, blow-outs, dying and other things, this entrepreneur needs a loan to buy some tools that will allow her to offer these types of services and so improve her income.

In the future, Sandra hopes to have her own premises with a Beauty Salon that will offer all these services.

loans.use: to buy a dryer, enamels, and dyes.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 36 years old and widowed. She runs a retail shop and it has been in operation for the last five years, making a monthly profit of KES 10,000. This will be her third loan. She has been loaned KES 30,000. She plans to purchase stock such as maize flour, sugar, matchboxes, salt, cooking fat, etc.

With the anticipated profits, she plans to support her family. In the near future, she hopes to have a well-established business that serves her entire community.

loans.use: to purchase stock such as maize flour, sugar, matchboxes, salt, and cooking fat

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Desde hace algunos años Luz Mary aprendió el arte de la marquetería, lo que le ha permitido generar sus propios ingresos desde su casa donde enmarca en madera, cuadros, fotografías y pinturas que sus clientes le llevan para enmarcar. 

Esta emprendedora sueña con tener un local propio en el que pueda ofrecer sus servicios, por ahora necesita de un préstamo para comprar materia prima y así mejorar su servicio
texts.en:
Several years ago, Luz Mary learned the art of marquetry, which has allowed her to earn her own income from her home.  She uses wood to frame  pictures, photographs and paintings which customers bring to her for framing.

This entrepreneur dreams of having her own premises where she can offer her services.  For now, she needs a loan to buy raw materials and so improve her service.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for framing pictures.

loans.name: Kolu

texts.en: Kolu is 35 years old and lives in Paynesville South. She is single and has four children ages 2 to 14. All four of them are presently in school. For the past three years she has been selling provisions, drinks, and other items. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cosmetics and soft drinks for her business. She plans to be a big business woman in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Jose Alex

texts.es:
José de 20 años de edad, es soltero, vive en sus padres, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

José desde hace 2 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (50 cabezas de ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento ideal para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus obligaciones personales.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles  para la compra de alimento balanceado, para que estén bien alimentados y los pueda ofrecer a mejor precio, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales y producto podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  José es un joven trabajador y con su esfuerzo a sabido salir por sus propios medios adelante y trata de seguir ayudando a sus padres en lo que puede.
texts.en:
José is 20 years old and single.  He lives with his parents, without running water or electricity, in the rural area of the Tambogrande district which is part of the Piura department.  This area's focus is on agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

For the last two years, José has been raising and selling sheep (50 head of sheep).  His farmyard, which is appropriate and extensive, is located in the rear of his home.  He feeds the sheep on balanced animal feed and natural pastureland, because his animals need to reach an ideal size for him to be able to offer them for sale in the different markets in the area, and so obtain good earnings to meet his personal obligations.

He has requested a loan of 1,000 New Soles from Edpyme Alternative for the purchase of balanced animal feed, so that the sheep will be well nourished and he can sell them for a better price.  With the earnings that he will get from the sale of his animals and products, he will be able to cover his loan as well as have a better quality of life.

José is a hard-working young man who through effort has been able to move ahead in life through his own means, and who tries to continue helping his parents however he can.

loans.use: to buy more balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes compró con su anterior financiamiento telas y accesorios para producir prendas de vestir para niñas especialmente. En la actualidad planea su segundo credikiva, con el cual comprará telas, accesorios y pagará mano de obra pues tiene un pedido de importante tamaño que desea cumplir. Su mensaje para los financiadores de Kiva el siguiente:
“Estoy muy agradecida por darles la oportunidad de trabajar a personas de la tercera edad como yo.”  
Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Mercedes ingrese al siguiente enlace: http://kiva.org/lend/233647
texts.en:
With her previous loan, Mercedes bought fabrics and accessories for making clothes, especially outfits for girls. She plans to use her second Kiva loan to buy fabrics, accessories, and pay for labor so that she can complete a large important order. Mercedes sends the following message to Kiva lenders: “I am grateful that you have given older people like me the opportunity to work.”

To learn more about Mercedes’ story, please click on the following link: http://kiva.org/lend/233647

loans.use: to buy fabrics, accessories, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa de 41 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace 6 años aproximadamente Rosa se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,etc), útiles de limpieza y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías para abastecer su bodega, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones familiares.  Rosa es una persona dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades para su familia al igual que brindarle otras oportunidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 41 years old and lives in her home with her husband and children. They do not receive basic services. Rosa resides in the rural section of the District of Tambogrande, which is part of the Department of Piura. This area is known for having businesses that involve agriculture, livestock breeding, and handicrafts.

For approximately six years, Rosa has sold groceries including everyday products such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, cleaning supplies, and beverages. Her business is located in her home, which allows her to be comfortable and secure. With the earnings she generates from the sale of her products, Rosa is able to cover all of her expenses and her household needs.

To expand her business, Rosa is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN. She will buy more merchandise to restock her store. Her only goal is to grow her business by having more products to offer to her customers. This will allow her to repay her loan and meet her family obligations. Rosa is a dedicated and hardworking person who is concerned about providing more comforts for her family and providing other opportunities for her children.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to restock her store.

loans.name: Germaine

texts.fr:
Cliente de 47 ans, mariée et mère de 7 enfants, elle arrête ses études en classe de troisième, ayant considérée sa charge et pour venir en aide sa famille elle ouvre une boucherie a domicile et achète des cartons de cuisses de poulets, des cartons de viandes, ailes  de poulets.
Elle vend en moyenne 10.000 frs à 40.000 frs par jour.

A l’octroi de son prêt elle va acheter les produits dont la demande est forte et les produits qu’elle n’arrive pas à acheter a cause de son faible capitale, tel que cartons de queue, cartons de poissons soles et bars, cartons de poules a bouillir et les cotes de porcs.

Elle a pour ambition d’ouvrir une chambre froide chez elle et de faire la vente en gros des vivres frais.  Avec ses bénéfices, elle va contribuer à payer les études universitaires de ses enfants.
texts.en: The client is 47 years old, married and the mother of 7 children. She stopped her studies in the third grade. Having considered her responsibility and to help her family, she opened a home-based butcher shop and sells containers of chicken thighs, containers of meat and chicken wings. She sells, on average, 10,000 to 40,000 frs a day. Upon the granting of the loan, she is going to buy the products whose demand is high and the products that she hasn't been able to buy because of her low capital, such as containers of tail, containers of fish (sole and bass), containers of boiled chicken and pork chops. She aims to open a cold room at her house and to wholesale fresh food. With her profits, she is going to contribute to pay for the university education of her children.

loans.use: To buy containers of poultry and beef

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase medicine (paractemol, and cough syrup) for her business.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María tiene 55 años D. edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijos, la cual cuenta con servicios D. agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito D. Catacaos que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona la actividad principal es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

María desD. hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. aves D. corral (gallinas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior D. su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos y pastos naturales; para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo y poder ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtener muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.  También prepara y venD. chicha D. jora la cual ofrece a sus clientes con la intensión D. adquirir otro ingreso para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para la compra D. alimento para sus aves D. corral e insumos para seguir elaborando la chicha D. jora, con las ganacias D. ambas actividades podrá pagar su crédito. María es una madre trabajadora, empeñosa y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su negocio crezca para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and children. They receive services such as running water and electricity. María resides in the District of Catacaos, which is part of the Department of Piura. The main business activities in this area involve agriculture, livestock breeding, and handicrafts.

María has been raising and selling chickens for several years. The birds are kept in an area behind her house and fed a diet of balanced feed and natural grasses. Once the animals reach the optimum level of growth, María offers them for sale at different markets in the area. With the good income that she earns, María is able to cover the family expenses. She also prepares and sells “chicha D. jora” (a beverage maD. of corn) and offers it to her customers with the intention of earning extra household income.

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN so that she can buy feed for her chickens and supplies for making “chicha D. jora”. With her earnings from both activities, she will be able to repay her loan. María is a hardworking, earnest, and responsible mother who only wants to grow her business so that her family can move forward.

loans.use: to buy feed for her chickens and supplies for making "chicha de jora".

loans.name: Bertha Maria

texts.es: Bertha vive en la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 11 a 16 años; allí tiene un negocio dedicado a la venta de mercancías variadas llamado “Comercialización Yesival”, el cual surgió para apoyar la gestión de su hogar, pues su esposo en su actividad estacionaria de albañilería, no alcanzaba a cubrir permanentemente los gatos del hogar y por eso decidió hacer un pequeña capital para apoyar con ingresos el bienestar de su familia. En su negocio vende principalmente de contado y otorga créditos a clientes previamente estudiados, con los cuales establece una buena relación comercial. Su credikiva es el segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará jeans, vestidos, sandalias y diversos accesorios, pues se acerca una época de un tradicional repunte de ventas, como lo es el mes del amor y de la amistad y ya tiene pedidos, con los que espera aumentar sus ingresos apoyada en esta inyección de capital de trabajo. Con su anterior crédito, aumentó ligeramente sus ingresos y principalmente pudo comprar de contado y en volumen mercancías con las cuales ganó descuentos especiales. Su meta gradual es capitalizar su negocio hasta convertirlo en un almacén y más adelante tener su propio local.
texts.en:
Bertha lives in the city of Cartagena de Indias with her husband and their three children.  The children range in age from 11 to 16.  She has a business called “Comercialización Yesival”, and she sells varied merchandise.  The business emerged in order to support the management of her household.  Her husband’s bricklaying work did not completely cover the household expenses.  Therefore, she decided to make a little money in order to support the family’s well-being.

In her business she mostly sells for cash.  She gives credit to those customers that she has previously learned about and with whom she has established a good commercial relationship.

This is her second Kiva loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy jeans, dresses, sandals, and various accessories.  The time for traditional sales is approaching as is the month of love and friendship.  She already has orders, and she hopes they increase her income supported by this injection of working capital.  With her previous loan she increased her income slightly, and she was mainly able to buy merchandise for cash and in volume.  She got specials discounts this way.

Her gradual goal is to capitalize her business and convert it into a store.  Later she wants to have her own place.

loans.use: to buy jeans, dresses, sandals, and various accessories.

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune très brave et qui vient de loin.Il a démarré par un commerce de produits alimentaires qu'il prenait à crédit auprès de fournisseurs et payait après avoir vendu.Ne parvenant pas à gagner assez, il s'engage comme apprenti tailleur pour apprendre le métier.Dix ans plus tard, il s'installe à son propre compte en prenant à crédit une machine à coudre et une table à 35 000F.Il solde le prêt en deux mois seulement et épargnant petit à petit, il finit par acquérir cinq machines.Aujourd'hui, son activité lui permet d'entretenir ses deux parents, son frères et ses 4 enfants.Pour préparer les prochaines fêtes religieuses, il sollicite auprès de l'UIMCEC un prêt de 100000F pour acheter 10 rouleaux de popeline, 5 paquets de fil,6 paquets de fermeture, 15 paquets de finition, 2 rouleaux d'élastique et 1 paquet de toile.Il a acheté un terrain dans sa localité et ambitionne d'y construire sa maison.
texts.en:
This borrower is good and honest young man who has come a long way. He started off with a grocery business that he acquired on credit from suppliers and repaid after selling it. Not having gained enough, he is dedicating himself as an apprentice tailor to learn the trade. Ten years later, he set up his own business by borrowing 35,000 francs for a sewing machine and a table. He repaid the loan in only two months saving money little by little. He finally acquired five machines. Today, his business enables him to take care of his two parents, his brothers, and his four children. 

To prepare for the coming religious holidays, he is requesting a loan of 100,000 francs from the micro-finance institution U-IMCEC to buy 10 rolls of poplin, 5 packets of thread, 6 packets of zippers, 15 packets of trim, 2 rolls of elastic, and a packet of fabric. 

He has purchased a plot of land in his town and has the ambition of building a house on it.

loans.use: To buy 10 rolls of poplin, 5 packets of thread, 6 packets of zippers, 15 packets of trim, 2 rolls of elastic, and a packet of sheer fabric

loans.name: Monday

texts.en: Monday is a 25-year-old hardworking man who owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling mattresses for eight months. He started with 1,600,000 shillings and now has 2,925,000 shillings. His vision is to set up a wholesale shop and start a family. Monday needs the loan to buy mattresses to sell.

loans.use: To buy mattresses to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy poultry and nutritionally-balanced feed for her cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy alcohol for resale.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 43 years old and married to Teresia. He has been operating his taxi for the last three years and making a monthly profit of 30,000 KES. This would be his fourth loan and he is requesting 75,000 KES to have his taxi serviced and repaired.

With the anticipated profit, he plans to purchase another taxi. In the near future he hopes to have a lorry for transportation services.

loans.use: to have his taxi serviced and repaired.

loans.name: Flor Maria

texts.es:
Flor de 20 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Monsefú que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Flor tiene como actividad laboral la elaboración de bordados de sábanas y manteles con máquina de coser, también ofrece el servicio de costura, desde hace unos años, su negocio lo tiene en su casa, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares diarias.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 600 para comprar material y así pueda seguir brindando un buen servicio y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ganancias para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Flor con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio adelante y a brindarle otras oportunidades en la vida a su familia.
texts.en:
20-year-old Flor lives with her husband and children in her own home which has water and electricity.  It is located in Monsefú district, in Chiclayo province: an area which is noted for its agriculture, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Flor's business is embroidering sheets and tablecloths with a sewing machine.  She also provides sewing services.  She has been in this business for some years and it is located in her home.  She has her own customer base and also works to order.  There isn't much competition in her field and she uses the income she makes to cover the daily needs of her family.

Flor has requested a loan for 600 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa, through their seed capital fund, in order to buy material so that she can continue providing a good service and fulfilling the orders that people have placed with her.  This will enable her to make more profits so that she can improve her family's quality of life.  Through a lot of effort and hard work, Flor has known how to move her business ahead and provide her family with more opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy material so that she can continue embroidering

loans.name: Oscar Eduardo

texts.es:
Oscar de 44 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Oscar desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (cabras y cerdos), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles  para la compra de más animales de otras especies y alimento balanceado, para tenerlos bien alimentados y con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Oscar es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido salir adelante y brindarle mejores oportunidades académicas a sus hijos.
texts.en:
44-year-old Oscar lives with his wife and children in his own home which does not have basic services and is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

For some years, Oscar has been raising and selling farmyard animals (goats and pigs).  His pens are located behind his home and are suitable.  He feeds his animals balanced feed and natural fodder so that they achieve optimal growth.  This enables him to sell them in the different markets in his area and make good profits with which to cover his family expenses.

Oscar has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy different species of animals as well as balanced feed for them so that he can keep them well fed.  He will be able to use the profits he makes from selling his animals to repay his loan and improve his family's quality of life.  Oscar is a person who, through effort and hard work, has known how to get ahead and provide his children with better academic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy different species of animals and their respective feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed and to repair her home

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo de 44 años cuenta que su negocio de papelería, impresiones y fotocopiado, nació con la intención de poderse capacitar él y su familia, conformada por su cónyuge y sus tres hijos de 9 a 20 años de edad, para tener un mejor nivel de vida, independencia y utilizar sus habilidades y conocimientos de una manera productiva. Fue así como empezó estudiando una carrera a distancia a través del internet, compro su primer computador y posteriormente una impresora, donde se le facilitó imprimir módulos de estudio, copias para su familia y para la comunidad que requería de sus servicios dando curso a su altruismo innato; posteriormente lo convirtió en su negocio y decidió ampliarlo, iniciando contactos con personal de gestión humana en la universidad donde estudiaba virtualmente, así mismo empezó a ofrecer los módulos a sus compañeros de estudio, logrando hacerles una oferta más económica en su carrera universitaria. No satisfecho con esto se puso en contacto con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, a través de  su asesor para recibir asesoría y apoyo en crédito para ampliar su negocio de una forma organizada; comprar papelería en volumen, vitrinas, y otros accesorios con los que potencializaría su capacidad comercial y con este objetivo conseguir  en un futuro, que la universidad a distancia apruebe su publicidad en los medios virtuales y hacer realidad su sueño de crecimiento. 
Gerardo es un hombre muy disciplinado y activo, trabaja como empleado en un almacén de cadena, está estudiando a distancia y desde hace 5 años tiene el negocio descrito. En su negocio refleja estados financieros que muestran el buen manejo de su negocio, con resultados de liquidez pues no existe endeudamiento, así como  su rentabilidad expresa un valor positivo de acuerdo con el tipo de actividad que ejerce y sus ingresos son provenientes de dos fuentes importantes: de su negocio y de su trabajo como empleado de una empresa.
En la actualidad sus buenas relaciones con su entorno ha impresionado, generando la recomendación de la universidad en la cual estudia,  para que se vincule con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el fin de lograr capital para que amplíe su infraestructura, con la finalidad de darle un contrato de impresión de módulos por semestre para los estudiantes. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, pues necesita comprar papelería al por mayor y un computador para ampliar su infraestructura de acuerdo a los requerimientos  que hace la Universidad para lograr el contrato que Gerardo persigue
texts.en:
Gerardo is 44 years old. He is married and has 3 children that range in age from 9 to 20 years. He says that his stationary, printing and photocopying business arose from his desire to take care of himself and his family, have a better standard of living, independence and use his skills and knowledge in a productive fashion. That was how he began studying for a career remotely via the Internet, bought his first computer and then a printer, where he could print out study modules, copies for family and the community which needed his services and gave an outlet to his innate altruism. Later he made this into his business and decided to expand, making contact with the human resources staff of the university where he was studying online and began to offer the printed modules to his fellow students, making their college career cheaper. Not content with this, he contacted the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, via its advisor, in order to receive advice and economic support in expanding his business in an organised way, buying stationary in bulk, cabinets and other accessories with which to realize the potential capacity of his business and in the future achieve the goal of having the distance learning university adopt his online advertising and realize his dreams of growing his business.

Gerardo is a very disciplined and active man. He works in a chain store, studies by distance learning and has run the business described for 5 years. His business financial statements reflect his good management, liquidity, as there is no debt, and profitability expressed as a positive value as is normal with this type of business. His income comes from two major sources: his business and his job as a company employee. 

Today, his good relationship with his surroundings has impressed the university at which he studies and brought about their recommendation for him to join the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to obtain the capital to expand his infrastructure. The end goal is to obtain a contract to print modules every semester for the students. This is precisely the reason he is approaching credikiva as he needs to buy stationary in bulk and a computor to expand the infrastructure of his business in accordance with the university's requirements so that Gerardo gets the contract.

loans.use: to buy stationery in bulk and a computer to expand his infrastructure.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 47 years old and married to Mary. They have four school-going children. 

He has been operating his quarry business alongside his motorbike transport business for the past 19 years, making a monthly profit of KES 12,000.

This is his first loan. He has been loaned KES 10,000, with which he plans to buy an extra quarrying site.

With the anticipated profit, he plans to add an extra motorbike and purchase another quarry. In the near future, he plans to buy himself a canter that will enhance transport to and from the quarrying site.

loans.use: to buy an extra quarrying site.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos de 53 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Monsefú que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Santos desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento ideal para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus obligaciones familiares.  También alquila tierras de cultivo donde siembra maiz y una vez que coseche podrá obtener otro ingreso para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles  para la abono para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo y compra de alimento balanceado , con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales y producto podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Santos es una persona que con esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar a sus hijos adelante y poderle brindar otras oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
53-year-old Santos lives with his wife and children in his own home which does not have basic services and is located in the rural part of Monsefú district, in Chiclayo province.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

For some years, Santos has been raising and selling sheep.  His animal pen is located behind his home and it is both suitable and spacious.  He feeds his animals balanced feed and natural fodder so that they achieve an ideal level of growth and he is able to sell them in the different markets in his area.  This makes him good profits with which he covers his family's expenses.  He also rents farmland where he grows corn.  When he harvests his corn, he is able to make additional income for his household.

Santos has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy manure with which to improve his farmland.  He will also buy balanced animal feed.  He will use the profits he makes from selling his animals and crops to repay his loan and also enjoy a better quality of life.  Santos is someone who, through his effort and hard work, has known how to get his children ahead in life and provide them with opportunities.

loans.use: to buy manure to improve his farmland and to buy feed for his animals

loans.name: Twikure Mu Bukene B Group

texts.fr:
Leonille fait partie du groupe Twikuremubukene B. Le nom du groupe signifie « chasser la pauvreté ». Leonille est née au Rwanda et a 50 ans. Elle est mariée avec 8 enfants de 5 à 25 ans, dont 5 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Leonille est agricultrice. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin de louer des champs pour cultiver le maïs, acheter le maïs pour semer, acheter des engrais et payer la main d’œuvre. Les difficultés qu’elle prévoit pour ce crédit sont la possibilité de vol pendant que le maïs est encore dans les champs et les conditions climatiques difficiles. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d‘acheter des autres champs pour ne plus louer à cultiver et de renforcer ses cultures. Dans les prochaines années, Leonille voudrait devenir une agricultrice moderne et avoir des champs suffisants pour cultiver et créer de l’emploi pour les autres. Avec les profits, elle prévoit de payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants, de se faire assurer et d’épargner.
texts.en:
Leonille is part of the group Twikuremubukene B. The group's name means "to banish poverty". Leonille was born in Rwanda and is 50 years old. She is married and has eight children, ages 5 to 25. Five of the children are in school. She has a 6th grade education. 

Leonille is a farmer. This loan cycle is her second one with ACB. She is going to use her loan to rent fields for growing corn, to buy corn to sow, to buy fertilizer, and to cover the cost of labor. The difficulties she anticipates for this loan are the possibility of theft while the corn is still in the fields and also severe climactic conditions. 

Her strategy for business growth is to buy other fields to avoid paying rent for farming and to boost her crops. In the next few years, she would like to become a modern farmer and to have fields sufficient enough for farming and for creating employment for other people. With the profits, she anticipates covering the schooling costs for her children, getting insurance, and saving money.

loans.use: To rent fields to grow corn, to buy corn to sow, to buy fertilizer, and to cover the cost of labor

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es socia del Banco Comunal Inti, tiene 30 años y 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 2 años, tiene un Taller de planchado y pintura, antes trabajaba como secretaria en una agencia de viajes al interior de Ayacucho.
A Carmen le gusta mucho las reuniones de su Banco Comunal, porque aprende mucho en las capacitaciones y agradece todo lo que obtubo, ya que su taller y todo lo que tiene como sus carros lo ha podido comprar con sus ahorros y los préstamos que ha recibido, su sueño es implementar su negocio y comprar mejores maquinarias para su Taller.
texts.en: Carmen is a member of Inti community bank. She is 30 years old and has two children. She has belonged to Kiva partner FINCA Peru for the past two years. Carmen has an auto body and painting shop. Previously she worked as a secretary for a travel agency in central Ayacucho. Carmen really enjoys her meetings with her community bank because she learns a lot about training. She appreciates everything because her shop and everything she has, like her cars, she bought with her savings and the loans she has received. Her dream is to set up her business and purchase better machinery for her shop.

loans.use: to purchase machinery for her business.

loans.name: Segundo Alejandro

texts.es:
Segundo de 57 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Cayaltí que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Segundo brinda servicio como odontólogo en la zona donde vive, desde hace varios años, es conocido por los pobladores por el buen servicio y atención que brinda a sus clientes, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá cubrir sus gastos diarios de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles  para la compra de nuevas herramientas y materiales dentales para seguir brindando el buen servicio que le caracteriza, al mejorar su atención tendrá más clientes y por ende sus ganancias aumentarán lo que le permitirá solventar su crédito otorgado ymejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Segundo es un hombre correcto, trabajador y que se esfuerza día a día para que su familia tenga lo que él no pudo tener y brindarle más comodidades.
texts.en:
57-year-old Segundo lives with his family in his own home which has access to all services.  It is located in the urban part of Cayaltí district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

Segundo works as a dentist in the area in which he lives.  He has been in this business for several years and is known by the locals for the good service he provides to his patients.  He uses the income that he makes to cover his household's daily expenses.

Segundo has requested a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternative to buy new dental tools and equipment so that he can continue providing the good service that he is known for.  By improving his service, he will gain more patients and, consequently, his profits will increase.  This will allow him to repay his loan and improve his family's quality of life.  Segundo is a polite, hard-working man who works hard every day in order to ensure his family has what he was not able to have himself and to provide them with more comforts.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment

loans.name: Marlon Arley

texts.es: Marlon de 26 años vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 4 años y 4 meses de nacido. Él tiene un establecimiento donde presta el servicio de alquiler de video-juegos, tiene 6 televisores y allí acuden las personas a jugar en los equipos. Aproximadamente tiene 6 años de estar funcionando en estas instalaciones, a su alrededor existen otros establecimiento que ofrecen los mismos servicios pero que espera superar aplicando mayor tecnología gradualmente. Su negocio inició por la necesidad de generar otros ingresos para responder a los gastos del hogar y en compañía de su esposo generar mayor bienestar. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará juegos más modernos y también hará adecuaciones que generen mayor comodidad y un ambiente confortable a su exigente clientela. Su mayor desafío es lograr financiación para aumentar su capital de trabajo y eso es lo que justamente el camino que iniciará al acceder a estos financiamientos.
texts.en:
26-year-old Marlon lives with his wife and two children.  His children are 4 years and 4 months respectively.  Marlon has an establishment where he provides a video game service.  He has six television sets and people come to play games.  He has been working in this business for approximately six years.  There are other establishments locally which offer the same services but he hopes to survive by gradually using more technology.  He started his business as he needed to make income to cover his household expenses and, together with his wife, provide his family with more comfort.

This Kiva loan is the first loan that Marlon has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will use it to buy more up-to-date games and also make some changes in order to provide a comfortable environment for his discerning customers.  Marlon's biggest challenge is obtaining funding in order to increase his working capital and this is precisely the path that he will open up by accessing these loans.

loans.use: to buy more up-to-date games and to make some changes in order to provide a comfortable environment

loans.name: Orly Nila

texts.es: Orly es socia del Banco Comunal El Sol, tiene 33 años y 3 hijos. Orly es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 7 años, vende Lácteos en su tienda y ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la producción de lácteos, ella empezó su negocio haciendo panes, pero desde que se casó empezó un nuevo proyecto con su esposo, juntos empezaron a construir una Planta para la producción de quesos y variaciones, agradece por los préstamos recibidos, gracias a ello le ayudaron a poder cumplir con este proyecto que tenían, ahora su meta es poder terminar de construir la Planta. Orly manifiestas que en su Banco Comunal aprendió muchas cosas y gracias a ello ahora tiene todo lo que se propuso.
texts.en: Orly is a member of El Sol community bank. She is 33 years old and has three children. She has been a member of Kiva partner FINCA Peru for the past seven years. Orly sells dairy products at a store and is requesting the loan to invest in ingredients to make these dairy products. She started her business making bread, but since she got married she started a new project with her husband. Together they started construction on a plant to produce cheeses and other products. She is grateful for the loans she has received, thanks to which she has been able to carry out this project. Now her goal is to finish construction on the plant. Orly says she has learned a lot at her community bank and because of it she now has everything she intended.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To open a boutique in Kitengela and buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Zurima Esther

texts.es: Zurima de 44 años de edad vive al sur de la ciudad con su esposo y su hijo de 14 años de edad. Allí tiene una heladería desde hace 8 años la cual inició en compañía de su esposo. Él trabajaba en una estación de gasolina en un municipio del departamento del Magdalena y cuando quedó desempleado aplicó su liquidación a la venta de helado y también al comercio de mercancía variada. Su negocio gradualmente ha ido creciendo y hoy requiere una mayor inyección de capital de trabajo para comprar un juego de mesas y sillas y surtir su negocio con nuevos productos que están de moda en el mercado. Este su credikiva, es el tercer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la que ha logrado mejorar su negocio en los aspectos físicos y de capital de trabajo. Su sueño es ubicar su negocio en un local, pues en la actualidad funciona en la terraza de su vivienda. Sus indicadores financieros, desde los cuales potencializa su crecimiento son los siguientes: Rentabilidad sobre las ventas 19%, rotación de cuentas por cobrar 3 días, rotación de inventarios 1 día.
texts.en:
44-year-old Zurima lives in the south of the city together with her husband and 14-year-old son.  She has owned an ice-cream parlor there for eight years.  She started the business with her husband.  Zurima's husband used to work in a gas station in a town in Magdalena department.  When he lost his job, he used his severance pay to buy ice cream to sell and also other merchandise.  The business has gradually grown and now Zurima needs a bigger injection of working capital so that they can buy a set of tables and chairs and stock their business with new, popular products.

This Kiva loan is Zurima's third loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With the organization's help, she has managed to improve her business both physically and as regards working capital.  Her dream is to have premises for her business as she currently runs it outside her home.  Zurima's financial indicators, from which she boosts her growth, are as follows: return on sales - 19%, accounts receivable turnover - 3 days, stock turnover - 1 day.

loans.use: to buy a set of tables and chairs and to stock her business with new, popular products

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Después de quedar viuda, Carmen se dedicó a la venta de mercancía desde su casa, inició con artículos para el hogar y actualmente también vende zapatos. A sus 60 años de edad esta emprendedora se siente bendecida pues gracias a su trabajo genera sus propios ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades básicas. 

Con el tiempo espera tener un punto de venta propio en el que pueda ofrecer sus productos. Actualmente necesita de un crédito para comprar mercancía y así abastecerse para el fin de año y generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
After becoming a widow, Carmen started selling merchandise from her home.  She started out selling household goods and now sells shoes as well.  At 60 years of age, this entrepreneur feels blessed because, thanks to her work, she makes her own income with which she covers her basic needs.

Over time, Carmen hopes to have her own sales location where she can sell her products.  She currently needs a loan to buy merchandise so that she can stock up for the end of the year and make more income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (shoes)

loans.name: Carmelo

texts.es:
El señor Carmelo es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor de 56 años quien se dedica a la venta de mercadería general entre los productos que comercializa están las almohadas, camisas, abanicos…etc. Este negocio lo inicio hace 10 años con unos cuantos productos y poco a poco fue creciendo.
El invertirá el crédito en blusas y electrodomésticos para seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
Carmelo is a hardworking and entrepreneurial 56 year old man that sells merchandise, some of the products he sells are pillows, shirts, fans, etc.  This business was started 10 years ago with a few products and it slowly grew to more.  
He will invest the loan in shirts and electrical appliances to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy clothes and electrical appliances

loans.name: Jenifer Patricia

texts.es: Jenifer de 20 años tiene un estudio fotográfico ubicado en el barrio El Centro del municipio de Galapa, área metropolitana de la ciudad, desde el año 2007, allí labora junto con su esposo y realizan estudios fotográficos,  pendones, marquetería y filmaciones.  En su negocio tiene una muy buena infraestructura con equipos de revelado y excelente calidad en sus trabajos. Sus principales clientes son las madres de familias que desean registros de fechas importantes, como grados, cumpleaños, matrimonios  de sus hijos o familiares más cercanos. Su meta más adelante es tener un local propio para aumentar el bienestar de su hogar con mayores ingresos para  su familia. En la actualidad requiere su primer credikiva para la compra de una cámara fotográfica y material para revelado de fotografías. El balance general  de su negocio muestra que sus activos están concentrados básicamente en sus equipos de trabajo; su capital de trabajo es bajo por ello quiere ampliar su stop de materias primas, para aportarle al crecimiento de su negocio, tiene un gran potencial de crecimiento pues maneja un muy buen margen de rentabilidad y sus inventarios y su cartera rotan adecuadamente; su buena infraestructura y experiencia son importantes para garantizar el exito de esta inversión.  Su sueño y gran desafío es sacar adelante a su hijo hasta convertirlo en una persona de bien y muy exitosa y esto es el motor principal por el cual trabaja esforzadamente.
texts.en:
Since 2007, 20-year-old Jenifer has had a photography studio in El Centro neighborhood, in the town of Galapa, in the city's metropolitan area.  She works there together with her husband.  They shoot photos, make banners, produce marquetry and film.  Her business has very good infrastructure.  She has developing equipment and provides excellent-quality work.  Her main customers are mothers who want to record important dates such as graduations, birthdays and children's weddings or weddings of close family members.

Jenifer's goal for the future is to own her own premises so that she can improve her family's well-being with more income for her family.  Right now, she needs her first Kiva loan in order to buy a camera and equipment for developing photographs.  A general assessment of her business shows that her assets are basically concentrated in her work equipment.  Her working capital is low and she would like to expand her stock of raw materials in order to aid the growth of her business.  She has great growth potential as she has a very good profit margin and an adequate turnover of both her stock and portfolio.  Her good infrastructure and experience are important in guaranteeing the success of this investment.  Her dream, and also her biggest challenge, is getting her son ahead in life so that he can become an upstanding, very successful person.  This is the main driving force behind her hard work.

loans.use: to buy a camera and equipment for developing photographs

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es: Mirtha es socia del Banco Comunal Yanapanakusun, tiene 34 años y 6 hijos, vende golosinas en el Parque Sucre, ahora invertirá para irse a Lima y comprar ropa porque quiere cambiar de negocio, ella es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 6 años, inició su negocio vendiendo también golosina en Huanta, a raíz de las fuertes lluvias  perdió todo lo que tenía, una de sus amigas la invitó a FINCA Peru y así empezó a ser socia, agradece por los préstamos obtenidos porque eso le ayudó en la educación de sus hijos, ahora tiene una casa pequeña y su sueño es comprar un terreno, lo que mas le gusta de las reuniones de su Banco Comunal es que le enseñaron a poder ser bien responsable, le enseñaron a ahorrar. Otra de sus metas es tener una Bodega.
texts.en: Mirtha is a member of the community bank Yanapanakusun, she is 34 and has six children.  She sells sweets in the Sucre park, she will invest the loan in traveling to Lima to buy clothing because she wants to start a new business, she has been a member of FINCA Peru for six years, she started the business selling sweets in Huanta, due to horrible storms she lost everything she had, one of her friends invited her to join FINCA Peru and that is how she became a member, she is grateful for the loans she has received because that helped her with the education of her children, she now has a small house and her dream is to buy a lot, what she likes the most from the meetings with the community bank is that they taught her to be responsible and to save.  Another one of her goals is to have a warehouse.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa e socia del Banco Comunal Yanapanakusun, tiene 36 años y 3 hijos, se dedica la Confitería (fabrica cancha de maíz y fideos), este préstamo lo invertirá para poder comprar mas maíz e insumos para hacer las canchas, ella tiene una fabrica para hacer las canchas, su esposo aprendió a hacer las canchas en Lima, y se vinieron a Ayacucho, empezaron con dos máquinas y ahora ya tiene 6 máquinas, da gracias a Finca porque le apoyaron mucho, aprende muchas cosa que le ayudan a poder practicarlo en su trabajo, y en su familia. La meta que tiene es poder ampliar su negocio, y terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the Communal Bank “Yanapanakusun”. She is 36 years old and has three children. Rosa makes food products such as “cancha de maíz” (an Andean roasted corn snack similar to corn nuts) and noodles. This loan will be invested in the purchase of corn and supplies for making “canchas”. She has a factory where these snacks are made. Her husband learned how to make “canchas” in Lima before coming to Ayacucho. He started out with two machines and now has six of them.

Thanks to FINCA Peru and the tremendous amount of support they have received, Rosa and her husband have learned many things that they practice in their work and in their family. Her goal is to expand her business and to finish the construction of her house.

loans.use: to buy corn and supplies for making "canchas".

loans.name: Maria Liria

texts.es:
A sus 51 años de edad, Maria Liria es una mujer emprendedora que desde hace algún tiempo se dedica a la confección de camisetas y chaquetas lo que le permite contribuir con el cubrimiento de los gastos del hogar. 

Maria Liria necesita de un crédito para comprar una máquina recubridora lo que le permitirá generar mayores ingresos pues no tendrá que subcontratar este servicio como lo hace actualmente.
texts.en:
At 51 years of age, Maria Liria is an entrepreneurial woman who has been making t-shirts and jackets for some time.  This enables her to contribute towards covering her household expenses. 

Maria Liria needs a loan to buy a 'máquina recubridora' (a special kind of sewing machine used for hemming).  This will allow her to make more income as she will no longer have to subcontract out this service which is what she currently does.

loans.use: to buy a 'máquina recubridora' (a special kind of sewing machine used for hemming)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy buckets, cups, bowls, plastic utensils and cooking utencils

loans.name: Luz Adiela

texts.es:
A sus 28 años de edad, Luz Adiela es una mujer emprendedora que después de quedar desempleada se dedicó a la cría de pollos lo que le permite aportar económicamente al hogar y generar ingresos adicionales. 

Esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar 30 pollos de engorde, así como concentrado para la cría de los mismos, lo que le permitirá generar mayores ingresos y mejorar así su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At 28 years old, Luz Adiela is an entrepreneurial woman who, after becoming unemployed, started raising chickens.  This enables her to contribute financially to her household and make additional income.

This entrepreneur needs a loan to buy 30 chickens to fatten as well as concentrate with which to feed them.  This will allow her to make more income and thereby improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chickens and concentrate

loans.name: Aleja

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Aleja; tiene 52 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 2 hijos los cuales ya son independientes; La socia trabaja en su propio negocio, la socia tiene una vidriería y ella lo administra, la socia salió adelante porque es una mujer fuerte y luchadora, la socia constantemente está renovando su vidriería y le gusta mantenerse ocupada y seguir trabajando y en esta ocasión la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería la socia también vende accesorios y manijas para puertas, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de mercadería.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Aleja belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 52 years old, single, and has two children who live independently.

Aleja works in her own business.  She has a glassworks which she runs.  She got ahead in life because she is a strong and tenacious woman.  She is constantly updating her glassworks and she likes to keep busy and continue working.  On this occasion, Aleja needs a loan to invest in buying merchandise.  She also sells door handles and fittings.  She would like to invest her loan in buying merchandise.

Aleja is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac, en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La  socia Victoria; tiene 67 años D. edad,  la socia es viuda; la socia tiene 3 hijos los cuales son todos independientes; La  socia trabaja como comerciante minorista, la socia lleva mercadería a Puerto Maldonado; y hay distribuye al por mayor y menor verduras a los diferentes contactos que la socia ya tiene, la socia lleva las verduras que producen en el anD. peruano como tomate, espinacas, albaca, perejil, apio, rabanitos, ajo, lechugas, cebollas con cola entre otros, la socia requiere el crédito para invertir en la compra D. verduras al por mayor y para sus pasajes, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. mercadería D. tipo verduras y para sus pasajes.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
Victoria belongs to the CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 67 years old, widowed, and has three children who all live independently.

Victoria is a retailer.  She transports merchandise to Puerto Maldonado and there she sells vegetables wholesale and retail to her different contacts.  She transports vegetables which are grown in the Peruvian Andes such as tomatoes, spinach, basil, parsley, celery, radishes, garlic, lettuce, green onions, etc.  Victoria needs this loan to invest in buying vegetables wholesale and to cover her travel expenses.

Victoria is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (vegetables) and to cover for her travel expenses

loans.name: Annalie

texts.en:
Annalie is 34 years old, married, and has three children. The oldest child is 9 years old.

Annalie has been engaged in farming for 10 years. She helps her husband plant rice and corn crops on their land. They earn about 9,000 PHP per month doing this farming.

Annalie is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs. This loan will help Annalie’s family continue generating income from their farm.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loans.name: Babita

texts.en:
In Nepal, large supermarkets are rare. Instead, most items can be found in the small, densely packed pasals that line the streets of every city and village. Piled high with utensils, paper goods, and anything else one would need, these stores are your one-stop shop in Nepal. Although usually packed into a space no larger than 100 square feet, these stores carry a sizeable and diverse inventory.  

With the help of a Kiva loan, pasal owners are able to keep inventory up and their customers happy. Competition is fierce, but with extra capital and a bit of creativity, the opportunity for profit is there.

Babita is 33 years-old. She is married and has one child, age 4.  

In 2002, she established her kitchen utensil store business. Working seven days a week and 14 hours a day, she supports her family.  

She has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW and used it to increase the inventory of her store.  

In the future, Babita plans to expand the business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more kitchen utensils to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Famy

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Famy; tiene 35 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 3 hijos de 12, 7, 14 meses de edad; la socia trabaja en su hostal en la ciudad del Cusco, la socia  es nueva integrante y ella desea invertir el crédito en la compra de colchas, frazadas, sabanas para mejorar y renovar  su hospedaje, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en su negocio mediante la compra de frazadas  de primera y de colchas nuevas para cambiar las que ya tiene por estas nuevas y de este modo mejorar su calidad de servicio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de colchas y frazadas para el hostal.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Famy belongs to the CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 35 years old, married, and has three children aged 12, 7 and 14 months.  She works in her own guest house in the city of Cusco.  Famy is a new member and she would like to invest her loan in buying bedspreads, blankets and sheets so that she can improve and renovate her guest house.  She needs a loan to invest in her business by purchasing new blankets and bedspreads to replace the ones she already has.  In this way, she will be able to improve her quality of service.

Famy is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads and blankets for her guest house

loans.name: Arnold

texts.en:
Arnold is a farmer who works in the town of Banga in South Cotabato Province. He has been growing and selling rice and corn for 15 years. Arnold is able to provide for his family through his income from farming.

Arnold is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and other farm supplies. He hopes for his business to grow.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Angele

texts.fr:
Cliente âgée de 56 ans, célibataire et mère de 03 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 16 et 28 ans. Avec un niveau d’études secondaire, voyant sa charge , elle s’est lancée dans la vente des produits alimentaires.
Ses ventes sont de 15.000 frs a 30.000 frs par jour.
  Ce prêt la permettra de renforcer le stock des produits alimentaires comme les cartons de tomates , cartons de conserves, bidon d'huile,
Minimiser ses dépenses pour plus épargner est la stratégie qu’elle envisage mettre en application pour réaliser son ambition d’être propriétaire d’un supermarché. Très entreprenante, elle fait face aux droits de ces enfants
texts.en:
Angele is 56 years old and the single mother of 3 children aged between 16 and 28. She has a secondary level education and started selling food products in order to be able to support her family. Her daily sales total between 15 000 and 30 000 francs.
She will use this loan to restock on food items including boxes of tomatoes, canned goods and cans of oil. A very enterprising woman, she plans to minimize her business expenditures so that she can save up, provide for her children, and one day fulfill her dream of owning a supermarket.

loans.use: to buy boxes of tomatoes, canned goods, cans of oil etc.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is a 35-year-old married woman with four children. The oldest child is 16 years old.

Chona is a farmer working in Banga, South Cotabato. She grows rice and corn crops to sell. Chona has had her farming business for 15 years. She requested a loan to purchase sacks of fertilizer and other farming materials. She hopes to earn more money and be able to improve her house.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizer and other farming materials.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is 46 years old and married. He has a 20-year-old child.

Edwin is a farmer working in Banga, South Cotabato. He owns the land that he tills to plant rice crops. Edwin sells his harvest to rice traders. He said he earns about 9,000 PHP per month from farming.

Edwin requested this loan to purchase rice seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs. He hopes to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loans.name: Bello Amanecer Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal conformado por Juana Guillermina, Maria Enriqueta, Dominga Del Socorro, Isidra Maria, Lidi Maikely, Keyla Maria, Gertrudis Patricia, Norma Isabel, Carlo José y Norma Isabel. Son personas responsables que disfrutan de sus diferentes actividades económicas a las que se dedican. En el caso de Juan se dedica a una pulpería, que posee desde hace más de 1 año a pesar que no ha sido fácil mantener esta actividad por la gran competencia que existe Juana no se deja abatir por los problemas y cada día se esmera en el servicio que proporciona a sus clientes. el crédito que solicita es para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, fósforos, sopas, golosinas entre otros.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Bello Amanecer" (beautiful dawn) is composed of Juana Guillermina, María Enriqueta, Dominga Del Socorro, Isidra María, Lidi Maikely, Keyla María, Gertrudis Patricia, Norma Isabel, Carlo José and Norma Isabel. They are responsible people who like the various activities in which they have engaged.

Juana runs a general store that she has owned for over a year, despite the difficulties to keep it because of the harsh competition in her area. Juana does not let her problems get her down and every day she strives to provide for her customers. She will use her loan to buy basic grains, detergents, matches, soups, snacks and other goods.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergents, matches, soups, snacks and other goods.

loans.name: Ismenia

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Ismenia; La socia al igual que sus compañeras es nueva en el banco de hecho el mismo banco es nuevo y todos los socios se encuentran muy emocionados ya que es la primera vez que se organizan de esta manera y que piden un crédito para poder invertir en sus negocios y mejorar en la calidad de servicios que prestan, la socia tienen una agencia de viajes llamada Hiran Bingan;  y la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de equipo de camping, ella alquila y vende equipo para hacer caminatas, canotaje, caballos y otros tours, la socia por esta razón requiere le préstamo para invertir en la compra de equipo de camping y poder implementar su agencia de viajes, ella aparte de ofrecer sus servicios de tour guiado alquila el quipo para cada ocasión; la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de equipo de camping.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Ismenia belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  In common with her fellow bank members, Ismenia is new.  The whole bank is new and all its members are very excited as this is the first time that they have organized themselves in this way.  They are all requesting a loan so that they can invest in their businesses and improve the quality of the services they provide.

Ismenia owns a travel agency called 'Hiran Bingan'.  She would like to invest her loan in buying camping equipment.  She rents out and sells hiking equipment, canoeing equipment, horse-riding equipment, etc.  She needs this loan to invest in buying camping equipment so that she can stock her travel agency.  In addition to offering her services as a tour guide, she also rents out equipment for every occasion.

Ismenia is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy camping equipment

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Vilma; tiene 53 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 4 hijos los cuales ya todos son independientes, la socia trabaja en una agencia de viajes ella es considerada la comisionista, la socia trabaja con sus amiga la dueña y le gusta su trabajo y ahora está deseando el crédito para poder comprar bloquetas en la cantidad de un millar para construir su casa, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y sola saco adelante a sus hijos, ella ahora quiere  construir su casa y con la ayuda de sus hijos  harán todos los acabados, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un millar de bloquetas para construir su vivienda.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Vilma belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 53 years old, single, and has four children who all live independently.

Vilma works in a travel agency where she is a commission agent.  She works with her friend who owns the business and she enjoys her work.  She would like this loan so that she can buy one thousand blocks with which to build her house.  Vilma is a very hard-working woman who got her children ahead in life on her own.  She would like to build a house with the help of her children.  They will do all the finishing work.

Vilma is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy a thousand blocks to build her house

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Karina; tiene 27 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; La socia trabaja en una agencia de viajes y turismo, la socia ella es socia y ahora que se  está iniciando como socia del banco comunal, ella desea invertir el crédito que se le otorgara en la compra de un televisor y una computadora ensamblada para su agencia de viajes, la socia cuenta con un pequeño ahorro que le permitirá aumentar para el pago de sus equipos, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en su agencia de viajes y de este modo brindar más calidad de servicio y poder emitir en la televisión los videos de los turistas y ver con anticipación el trabajo que realizan ellos. La socia solicita e préstamo para invertir en la compra de un televisor y aumentar dinero para comprar una computadora para su agencia de viajes y turismo.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Karina belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 27 years old and lives with her partner.

Karina works in a travel and tourism agency.  She is a new community bank member and would like to invest the loan that she will receive in buying a television set and an off-the-shelf computer for her travel agency.  Karina has a small amount of savings which she will be able to add to her loan in order to pay for this equipment.  She is requesting a loan to invest in her travel agency so that she can provide a better quality of service.  She will use the television set to show tourist videos to see in advance the work that they do.  Karina is requesting this loan to invest in buying a television set and to increase the sum of money she already has in order to buy a computer for her travel and tourism agency.

Karina is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy a television set and to add to some existing money in order to buy a computer for her travel and tourism agency

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy basic grains, spices, sweets, detergents, bread, cookies, etc.

loans.name: Giscard Poget Floden

texts.fr:
M
Client âgé de 31 ans, marié et sans enfant. N’ayant pas de soutien pour la poursuite de ses études supérieures, il s’est lancé dans la fourniture des cartes prépayées et l’installation d’une cabine téléphonique.
Ses recettes sont de 50.000frs a 80.000frs par jour, 
L’octroi du crédit lui permettra de renforcer sa cabine, l’épargne et la bonne gestion sont les  stratégiques qu'il  met en œuvre pour assurer la croissance de son activité. Très optimiste, il entreprend des relations de bonne coopération avec son environnement.
texts.en: The Client is 31 years old, married and has no children. Not having the support for the pursuit of his higher education, he started in the supply of prepaid cards and the installation of a telephone booth. His receipts are from 50,000 - 80,000 frs a day. The granting of the loan will allow him to strengthen his booth. Savings and good management are the strategies that he implements to ensure the growth of his business. Very optimistic, he fosters good collaborative relationships within his environment.

loans.use: To buy prepaid cards from de MNT, AZUR, AIRTEL, WARID

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a truckload of firewood

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac, en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La  socia Marina; tiene 59 años D. edad,  la socia es viudo; la socia tiene 1 hijo D.  17 años D. edad; La socia tiene en su propia casa un pequeño negocio la socia ha puesto una pensión familiar, ella prepara diferentes potajes y los venD. a la hora del almuerzo, la socia prepara menús , este menú trae una sopa casera, un segundo que es el plato D. fondo, y una fruta o postre, mas el refresco, la socia piD. 2.50 soles por cada menú que ella venD., en las tardes ella prepara extras que son platos con presas muy grandes, bien servidos y cobra 5.00 nuevos soles; la socia también venD. cervezas chics a los clientes por las tardes y D. este modo ella tiene mayores ingresos, la socia solicita el préstamo en esta  ocasión el crédito para invertir en la compra D. insumos como arroz, aceite, papas, fideos y otros productos que le permitan ahorrar, también desea invertir en la compra D. cervezas para su venta, la socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para la preparación D. los diferentes potajes y cervezas.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
Marina belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 59 years old, widowed, and has a 17-year-old son.

Marina has a small business in her home.  She has set up a small family restaurant where she prepares soups to sell at lunchtime.  She prepares set meals which incluD. a home-maD. soup, a main course, fruit or dessert, and a drink.  She asks 2.50 soles for each meal that she sells.  In the afternoon, she prepares larger meals which are well served.  For these she charges 5.00 soles.  In addition, Marina sells beer to her afternoon customers which makes her more income.  She is requesting a loan on this occasion to invest in buying supplies such as rice, oil, potatoes, noodles and other products which will allow her to save.  She would also like to invest in buying beer to sell.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for making her soups and also to buy beer.

Marina is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making different soups and to buy beer

loans.name: Jessica Belinda

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.
