La  socia Jessica; tiene18 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia trabaja en una lavandería, ella es estudiante y este año terminara la secundaria, la socia estudia y trabaja por lo que en esta ocasión desea un crédito ella requiere el préstamo para invertir en sus estudios, la socia terminara sus estudios secundarios, ella piensa preparase para dar el examen de ingreso al próximo año para la universidad y seguir una carrera profesional la socia dice que le gustaría estudiar turismo pero aun está en duda y por el momento ella seguirá trabajando para seguir manteniéndose. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en sus estudios.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "CUSCO" which is located in the Huanchac District in the province and department of Cusco.

Jessica is 18, single and works at a laundromat.  She is also a student and will be finishing high school this year.  She is requesting a loan to pay for school expenses so she can graduate.  She wants to prepare for the college entrance exam and would like to study Tourism, but is still unsure at this point and must keep working to support herself.  The loan will be used to pay for her education.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To pay for tuition.

loans.name: Rosayde

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Rosayde; tiene 25 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia  trabaja años en una agencia de viajes pero ella ahora esta independizándose y apertura una agencia de viajes, la socia estudio turismo y con todos los años de experiencia ella tendrá sus propia agencia de viajes, la socia desea el crédito en esta ocasión para poder invertir en la agencia de viajes ella necesita ahora poder implementar la agencia y para ello ella cuenta con un pequeño ahorro que tiene pero de todas maneras a ella le servirá muchísimo para completar con sus proyectos el préstamo que se le pueda otorgar, la socia desea invertir en la compra de una computadora para hacer sus reservas y poner sus paquetes en línea. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de una computadora para su nueva agencia de viajes y turismo.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Rosayde belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 25 years old and single.

Rosayde has been working in a travel agency for years.  However, now she is setting up on her own and opening her own travel agency.  She studied tourism and, with all her years of experience, she will have her own travel agency.  She would like a loan on this occasion to invest in her travel agency as she needs to stock her business.  Rosayde has a small amount of savings but this loan will be really useful in helping her to complete her projects.  She would like to invest in buying a computer for making her reservations and putting her packages on line.  She is requesting a loan to invest in buying a computer for her new travel and tourism agency.

Rosayde is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying a computer for her new travel and tourism agency

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 40 years old and married. She has four children. The oldest child is 22 years old.

Flordeliza is a farmer who tills land in Banga, South Cotabato. She grows rice and corn crops to sell. 

Aside from farming, she also runs a sari-sari (variety) store and sells fish to the people in her community. 

Flordeliza works hard to support her family. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers, more items for her store and more fish to sell. She hopes to be able to sustain her children’s education through her businesses.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and more items and fish to sell

loans.name: Bunawona Womens Group

texts.en:
Roze, 43, has been doing well with her food sales business in the last decade. Roze, a buoyant and happily married mother of three, is keen as a mustard about her business, and this may explain the business success she has enjoyed so far.

Roze principally engages in the selling of foods such as maize, bananas and cassava. These sell highly on the food markets. Her auxiliary business is milk sales. 

Her weekly sales income totals up to UGX 150,000, and she intends to use her loan to purchase more food and milk to resell.

For Roze’s group, this is the fourth loan.

loans.use: to purchase more food and milk to resell.

loans.name: Madelaine

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “CUSCO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Madelaine; tiene 42 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 27, 20 años de edad; La socia se dedica al alquiler de equipo de sonido y luces, la socia trabaja con los diferentes eventos de matrimonios, quinceañeros, despedidas de solteros, bodas  de plata, bodas de papel y otros eventos; La socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de micrófonos y de parlantes para mejorar su servicio, la socia  con la compra de estos accesorios mejorara sus eventos y tendrá mayor demanda. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de micrófonos y de parlantes.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete con cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Madelaine belongs to CUSCO community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.  She is 42 years old, single, and has two children aged 27 and 20.

Madelaine rents out sound equipment and lights.  She works at different events such as weddings, 15th birthday celebrations, bachelor parties (stag dos), silver wedding anniversaries, paper (first year) wedding anniversaries, etc.  She would like to invest this loan in buying microphones and speakers so that she can improve her service.  With the purchase of these items, she will improve the events she attends and increase demand for her services.

Madelaine is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, pledges to make her loan repayments in a discplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying microphones and speakers

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza De Corcona Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona” es un grupo formado por 10 personas trabajadoras y unidas que su único propósito es de seguir mejorando cada día, donde Félix es tesorero del grupo, cargo que ha llevado con responsabilidad. Félix tiene 55 años de edad es casado y tiene 04 hijos 03 de ellos en etapa escolar todavía, Felix  se inicio vendiendo comida ambulatoriamente, pero poco a poco fue creciendo su negocio y es así como decidió instalar su  restaurante pues el sabia  que obtendría mayores ganancias, donde  actualmente  brinda desayuno, almuerzo y cena, negocio familiar que le a permitido apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios y aportar con los gastos del hogar. Para el futuro a Félix le gustaría agrandar su restaurante y mejorarlo ya que nos comenta que solo es de material pre-fabricado. Con el   crédito que ha  solicitado lo va a invertir en la compra de  insumos como arroz, fideos, azúcar, aceite, entre otros. Félix junto a la Alcancía Comunal “La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona” están muy agradecidos con los préstamos brindados ya que hacen posible su progreso.
texts.en:
The communal bank La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona [New Hope of Corcona] is a group made up of 10 hard-working and united individuals whose sole purpose is to keep improving every day. 

Felix is the group's treasurer, a post he has carried out with responsibility. Felix is 55 years old, married, and has four children, three of whom are still in school. Felix started as a food street vendor, but little by little his business grew and so he decided to set up a restaurant. He knew that he would make a greater profit by offering breakfast, lunch and dinner as he does now. The family business has allowed him to support his children in their studies and contribute to household expenses. 

In the future Felix would like to expand and improve his restaurant; he mentions that it's only made of prefabricated material. With the loan that he has requested, Felix will purchase consumable products like rice, pasta, sugar, and oil, among other things. Felix and the communal bank La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona are very grateful for the loan they've been offered, as it makes progress possible for them.

loans.use: to buy rice, pasta, sugar, oil.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: Jaime  tiene 54 años, su actividad económica es la compra y venta de ganado. Hace más de 40 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que con la ayuda de su esposa es que ha logrado salir adelante. Consiguió adquirir experiencia necesaria para este negocio, pues la mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan muy buenos productos. El crédito es para la compra de toros, vacas, chivos, entre otros. El sueño de  Jaime es que sus hijos logren seguir con este medio de vida  pues obtiene ciertas ganancias.
texts.en: Jaime is 54 years old.  His business is buying and selling livestock and he has been in this business for more than 40 years.  With the help of his wife, he has managed to get ahead in life.  He managed to acquire the experience which he needs for this business as most of his customers request very good-quality products from him.  This loan will be used to buy bulls, cows, goats, etc.  Jaime's dream is for his children to manage to continue in this business as it makes decent profits.

loans.use: to buy bulls, cows and goats

loans.name: Jose Rolando

texts.es: José Rolando tiene 60 años. Es un hombre muy responsable vive con su compañera de vida. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es brindar servicio de transporte. Hace más de 13 años que inicio con este negocio cuando anteriormente trabaja en el ingenio santa rosa, fue así que inicialmente comenzó a trabajar. El solicita el financiamiento para la compra de llantas, focos, espejos, entre otros.
texts.en: José Rolando is 60 years old.  He is a very responsible man who lives with his life partner.  His business is providing a transport service.  He started this business 13 years ago, having previously worked in the Santa Rosa sugar refinery which is where he started his working life.  He is requesting this loan to buy tires, headlamps, mirrors, etc.

loans.use: to buy tires, headlamps, mirrors, etc.

loans.name: Julio Clemente

texts.es: Julio Clemente desde hace 10 años, el tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de taller electrónica y electricidad industrial. El señor se dedica a la reparación de equipos electrodomésticos también realiza sus servicios a domicilio en donde la mayoría de sus clientes quedan satisfechos con el negocio que realiza. Solamente el gran esfuerzo y responsabilidad han hecho que Julio siga con su negocio. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en comprar estaño, alicates, tijera electricista, pinza y soldador eléctrico.
texts.en: Julio Clemente has owned a business providing electronic and electrical services for ten years.  He repairs household appliances in his workshop and also works in people's homes where most of his customers are satisfied with the work that he does.  A lot of hard work and responsibility are what have kept Julio in business.  He is requesting this loan to invest in buying solder, pliers, electricians scissors and an electric soldering iron.

loans.use: to buy solder, pliers, electricians scissors and an electric soldering iron

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more materials like drums and molasses to increase her production.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es: Sebastián tiene 32 años. Es un hombre casado y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Su actividad económica es la ofrecer el servicio de barbería, uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido lograr complacer a sus clientes que diariamente llegan a su negocio en busca de variedad de productos.  Hace más de 3 años que se dedica a este negocio. Surge por la necesidad de brindarle a su familia lo necesario. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de talcos, cuchillas, vaselina, tijera, peines, cremas entre otros.
texts.en: Sebastián is 32 years old. He is married and is raising 2 children. His economic activity is offering barber services. One of his biggest challenges has been pleasing his customers who come to his business everyday seeking a variety of products. He has worked in this business for more than 3 years. He started because he needed to give his family what they need. The loan is for working capital to buy powders, blades, vaseline, scissors, combs and creams, among other things.

loans.use: to buy powders, blades, vaseline, scissors, combs and creams, among other things.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Trinidad; tiene 49 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 6 hijos de los cuales 3 son independientes y la socia vive con 3 en casa de 17, 19, 23  años de edad;  La socia se dedica  a comercio minorista de verduras, la socia tiene su terreno en el cual produce verduras, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de semillas de zanahoria, tomate, cebollas, asnapas, lechugas; La socia tiene su puesto en el mercado y ella vende los productos en su stand todos los días. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas de verduras para la venta en el mercado.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Trinidad is a member of the "FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA" ("Urubamba Fraternity") communal bank, located in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.

Trinidad is 49 years old. She is married with 6 children, 3 of which are self-sufficient. The other 3 live with her and are aged 17, 19 and 23. She works in retail, selling vegetables. She has some land where she grows vegetables and she would like to invest her loan in the purchase of carrot, tomato, onion, mixed herbs and lettuce seeds. She has a stall in the market where she sells her products every day.  She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of vegetable seeds to sell in the market. 

She is very grateful for the support received and is committed to paying back the loan as agreed.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds to sell in the market.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Eufemia; tiene 47 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 4 hijos de 28, 25, 22, 19 años de edad; La socia trabaja  como comerciante minorista, la socia tiene sus terrenos agrícolas y la socia cultiva, papa, maíz, verduras, la socia cuando no está tras de sus terrenos lleva  acabo la compra y venta de pasto, la socia tiene este negocio alterno y las épocas bajas para el cultivo ella vende pasto a las clientes que la buscan y le piden abastecimiento de pasto para sus ganados y cuyes; la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de maíz, papa, para la siembra. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para la siembra de maíz y papa.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Eufemia is a member of the "Fraternidad de Urubamba" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.  She is 47 years old, married, and has four children aged 28, 25, 22 and 19.  She works as a retailer and owns farmland where she grows potato, corn and vegetables.  When she is not working the land, Eufemia buys and sells fodder.  She has this additional business and during the off-season for farming, she sells fodder to customers who seek her out and ask her to supply fodder for their cattle and guinea pigs.  Eufemia would like to invest this loan in buying corn and potato to sow.  She is requesting the loan to invest in buying corn and potato seeds to sow.

Eufemia is grateful for the support that she will receive and, for her part, pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy corn and potato seeds

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Hilaria; tiene 50 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 31, 22  años de edad;  La socia se dedica al comercio minorista de verduras, la socia tiene su puesto en el mercado modelo de Urubamba y la socia trabaja en un stand vendiendo verduras todos los días de la semana, la socia compra de los proveedores a la semana y lleva sus verduras a vender en su stand, la socia vende tomate, lechuga, brócoli,  cebollas con cola y sin cola, habas, arvejas, zanahorias. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de verduras y el pago adelantado a sus proveedores.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Hilaria is a member of the "FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA" ("Urubamba Fraternity") communal bank, based in the district of Urubamba, in the province of  Urubamba, department of Cusco.

Hilaria is 50 years old and lives with her partner. She has 2 children aged 31 and 22. She works in retail selling vegetables. She has a stall in the local Urubamba market and works there selling vegetables every day of the week. She buys from her suppliers once a week and sells the vegetables from her stand. She sells tomatoes, lettuce, broccoli, two kinds of onions, beans, peas and carrots. She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of vegetables and to pay her suppliers in advance. 

She is grateful for the support received and is committed to repaying the loan as agreed.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and to pay her suppliers in advance.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy groceries to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase maize flour, sugar, rice, salt and beans to resell.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga Está aplicando a su segundo credikiva porque va a realizar adecuaciones locativas que generen un ambiente confortable a sus clientes. Con su primer credikiva quedó contenta porque comprá en volumen materias primas e insumos, compró utensilios e hizo reparaciones locativas tambien. Poco a poco su negocio va tomando imagen agradable y muy seguramente su clientela aumentará, porque les gusta la comida de Olga. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente:
"Gracias por la oportunidad que me brindaron para  poder fortalecer mi negocio ya que tenia créditos informales muy costosos, además compraba en las tiendas del barrio en pocas cantidades y salia mas caro." Si usted quiere leer la historia de Olga ingrese al siguiente enlace:

http://kiva.org/lend/219330
texts.en:
Olga is applying for her second loan with Kiva because she wants to make improvements to her business premises in order to provide her customerswith a more comfortable environment. She was happy with her first loan with Kiva because she was able to buy raw materials and ingredients wholesale, as well as utensils, and she made some repairs to the premises. Her business is slowly looking much better and her customer base is likely to grow, because they enjoy Olga's food. 

Her message to Kiva's lenders is: "Thanks for the opportunity that you gave me to strengthen my business. I had to resort to very costly private loans before and had to buy small quantities in local shops, which was more expensive". If you'd like to read Olga's full story please visit http://kiva.org/lend/219330.

loans.use: to improve her business premises to provide her customers with a comfortable atmosphere.

loans.name: Juanita Candelaria

texts.es: Juanita Candelaria tiene 60 años, ella es una mujer que no se deja abatir por las circunstancias. Ella tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad. Ella se dedica a brindar los servicios fúnebres, ella empezó el negocio siguiendo los pasos de su mama ya que anteriormente era su Mama quien tenía el negocio, fue con el paso del tiempo que Juanita se hizo cargo de esta actividad. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de candelas, cortinas, crucifijos, flores, entre otros. A pesar de tener esta edad es una persona muy activa y que brinda los mejores servicios.
texts.en:
Juanita Candelaria, age 60, is a woman who does not let circumstances overwhelm her. She has two grown children. Juanita provides funeral services. She started in this business by following in her mother’s footsteps. Her mother previously owned this business and then as time passed Juanita took charge of it.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy candles, curtains, crucifixes, flowers, and other items. Despite her age, Juana remains a very active person so that she can provide the best service.

loans.use: to buy candles, curtains, crucifixes, flowers, and other items for providing funeral services.

loans.name: Angelique

texts.fr:
Angélique est née au Rwanda. Elle est mariée avec un enfant de deux ans. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de secondaire. 

Angélique est commerçante de friperie. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des habilles pour hommes, femmes et enfants. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’acheter une grande quantité et vendre à bon prix. Dans les prochaines années, Angélique voudrait être parmi les dames puissantes entrepreneurs. Avec les profits, elle prévoit de payer les frais scolaires pour son enfant dès qu’il commence l’école.
texts.en:
Angélique was born in Rwanda. She is married and has a 2-year-old child and six years of secondary schooling. 

Angélique deals in second-hand clothing. This loan cycle is her first one with ACB. She is going to use her loan to buy clothing for men, women, and children. 

Her strategy for business growth is to buy a large quantity and sell at good prices. In the next few years, Angélique would like to be among those women who are powerful entrepreneurs. With the profits, she anticipates covering the cost of schooling for her son as soon as he begins school.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men, women, and children

loans.name: Anatolia

texts.es: Anatolia, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri de 41 años, es una mujer sencilla y trabajadora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Benjamín de 46 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarle  un futuro prometedor. Anatolia viene realizando la actividad del agro hace 23 años con mucho esmero y laboriosidad,  porque gracias a los frutos que le brinda sus cultivos de cacao y café ella adquirió más espacios de terreno para cultivar y también compró su propio lote de terreno donde actualmente se cobijan los miembros de su familia. Pero en tiempos de cosecha y deshierbo de malezas necesariamente contrata jornaleros para poder avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su faena programada. Anatolia cuenta con una hectárea de terreno sin cultivar, por lo cual necesariamente requiere el apoyo de la entidad financiera para llevar a cabo sus actividades programadas. Ella tiene pensado repoblar sus fincas con más plantas de cacao y es por ello que acude a los préstamos que la institución MFP facilita a las personas de bajos recursos con miras a progresar. Para el bien de su trabajo espera contar con la misma fuerza e ímpetu que la caracteriza para sacar adelante a sus hijos y cultivos. Este será su crédito número 15 con MFP y por ello espera de su colaboración para poder concretar sus planes y se compromete en pagar puntualmente su pago ya que desea acceder a otros prestamos futuros. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará más semillas de cacao para poder repoblar sus fincas.
texts.en:
Anatolia is 41 years old and a native of Quimbiri. She is a modest and hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband Benjamín, age 46, and their three beloved children from whom she wants to provide a promising future. Anatolia has been farming for 23 years. With great care and effort, she grows cacao and coffee. As a result of her production, she was able to acquire more space for growing these crops. Whenever she has to remove weeds or harvest her crops, Anatolia hires laborers to help with these tasks so that the work gets completed faster and she can stay on schedule. She purchased another piece of land where she currently lives with her family.

Anatolia has one hectare of land that has not been cultivated, so she needs capital for planting cacao. For this reason, she has approached MFP since the organization provides loans to people of limited resources who are looking to make progress. For the sake of her work, she hopes to bring the same level of effort and energy that she demonstrates when she is raising her children.

This is her 15th loan with MFP and she hopes to receive the necessary assistance so that she can accomplish her goals. Anatolia promises to complete her payments on time, just as she did with her previous loans. The loan of 2000 PEN that she requested will be used to buy more cacao seeds so that she can increase her plantings.

loans.use: to buy cacao seeds.

loans.name: Mapendo Plus Group

texts.en:
Sylvie is a chairwoman of a community bank named “Mapendo Plus.” The group is composed of 13 microentrepreneurs who are jointly united to receive loans from Kiva through MFI HOPE DRC, with the goal of developing their businesses.
Sylvie has been in business since 1980 with a starting capital of $80. Today, she operates a restaurant. She is 33 years old, married and has five children between the ages of seven months and 16 years old. All of them go to school. Her restaurant prospered thanks to HOPE’s loans. She makes a profit of about $30 per day. With the next loan, Sylvie intends to increase the inventory of the restaurant by purchasing one sack of corn flour, one sack of manioc flour, five liters of vegetable oil, and two bags of salted fish in order to increase her working capital. Currently, she is happy to be part of one of MFI HOPE’s groups. She joined in 2009 and her business has been strengthened through the nine loans she has received from MFI HOPE DRC. She repaid them all properly. Her dream is to someday open a catering service. Her restaurant is located in the western area of Kinshasa.

loans.use: to increase the inventory of the restaurant in order to reinforce the working capital.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena hace más de 31 años que se dedica a un salón de belleza, sus clientes llegan a buscarla a su vivienda en donde tiene una buena parte de mercadería, ella también sale a vender todos los días  temprano,  ella es muy humorista y reconocida por su gran carisma que ofrecer. Para Maria el tener un negocio le ha representado el fortalecimiento de su independencia para su hogar. Este crédito es para la compra de tijeras, peines, cremas, pinturas de labios, tratamientos,  pintura de labios.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is 31 years old and manages a beauty salon. Her customers come to her home where she has a good stock of merchandise. María Elena also sells every day during the early morning hours. She has a good sense of humor and is known for the great charisma that she shares with everyone.

For Maria, having a business means strengthening her independence so that she can manage her household. This loan will be used to buy scissors, combs, crèmes, lipsticks, and treatments.

loans.use: to buy scissors, combs, crèmes, lipsticks, and treatments.

loans.name: Celedonia

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Celedonia; tiene 40 años de edad,  la socia es soltera;  La socia se dedica  al comercio minorista, la socia vende desayunos hechos de quinua con manzana, la socia trabaja en la avenida principal de su barrio desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la mañana que se acaba los desayunos, la socia también vende sándwich de queso, tortas;  después se va a casa lava sus servicios arregla su pequeña improvisada carreta y se va a comprar algunos insumos frescos para el día siguiente, ella prepara estos desayunos desde las 3 de la mañana, la socia desea el crédito para poder invertir en la compra de insumos  como manzanas verdes, quinua es esta un poco cara, leche en tarros, tortas en moldes, algunas veces ella prepara los queques para vender y siempre prepara los sándwich. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la preparación diaria de sus desayunos.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Celedonia is a member of the Communal Bank “Fraternidad de Urubamba” (Brotherhood of Urubamba) which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 40 years old and single. Celedonia is a small businesswoman who sells breakfast meals made with quinoa and apples. She works along the main avenue of her neighborhood between the hours of 5am and 8am, or until she runs out of food. Celedonia also sells cheese sandwiches and cakes. Afterwards, she goes home to wash her utensils and rearrange her small improvised cart and then goes to buy a few fresh ingredients for the following day. Celedonia begins preparing breakfast meals at 3am. She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of supplies such as green apples, high-quality quinoa, canned milk, and prepared cakes. Sometimes she makes cupcakes to sell, but she always prepares sandwiches. Celedonia is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of these supplies that are used in her daily preparation of breakfast meals.

She is grateful for the support that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for preparing breakfast meals.

loans.name: Narcisse

texts.fr:
Client de 47 ans, marie et père de 8 enfants dont l'age varie entre 5 et 20 ans dont tous vont a l’école.Il y'a de cela 20 ans ,  a la faillite  et fermeture de l’unité de production ou il travaillait, vu la charge de ses enfants il se lance dans la vente des grillades dans un grand carrefour non loin du plus grand marche de la ville.
Ayant profite du peu d'argent qu'on lui avait paye, il acheta une barbecue et quelque cartons de cuisses de poulets, avec la forte demande de ses clients, le prêt lui permettra de renforcer le stocks de ses marchandises, tel que 5 cartons de cuisses de poulets, 5 cartons de gésiers et 2 cartons de poulets doux, ses ventes sont considérables, il a en moyenne 50.000 frs a 110.000 frs par jour.
Sa stratégie est de vendre tous les jours de 6h a minuit , très dynamique , il réalise des épargnes et avec ses bénéfices il assure la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Narcisse is 47 years old, married and the father of 8 children aged between 5 and 20, all of whom go to school. Twenty years ago, in order to be able support his family when the production unit where he worked went bankrupt and had to close down, Narcisse started selling grilled meat at a large crossroads near the biggest market in town. He used the small amount of money he had been paid to buy a barbecue and some boxes of chicken thighs. The resulting customer demand was high and, thanks to his considerable sales, he now makes on average between 50 000 and 110 000 francs a day.
An active and enterprising man, he sells his wares every day from 6 o´clock to midnight. He manages to make some savings and uses his profits to pay for his children´s education.
He will use this loan to restock on goods including 5 boxes of chicken thighs, 5 boxes of gizzards and 2 boxes of Doux chicken.

loans.use: to buy boxes of chicken thighs, boxes of Doux chicken and boxes of gizzards.

loans.name: Tahira's Group

texts.en:
Tahira is a very active lady who operates a business selling lace (used in clothes for designing). She sells the lace to different shopkeepers in the market and earns a good income, which enables her to pay off the utilities. She and her husband both operate this business from their home. Tahira is the mother of three sons. All of her sons do different kinds of work to contribute financially to the family.
  
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the betterment of her business selling laces. With the loan, she will buy laces of different variety such as beaded lace, simple and colorful lace in bulk, which will allow her to offer more variety to her clients and earn more profits. She has been operating her business along with her husband for the past 10 years and is very confident that an investment will bring more profits to her and will allow her family to have a better standard of life.

loans.use: To buy lace (used in clothes for designing) in bulk

loans.name: Eleazar

texts.es:
El señor Eleazar está solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar los gastos escolares de la escuela de sus dos hijos que tiene. 
Tiene que pagar la inscripción y comprar los útiles escolares que son cuadernos, libros y carpetas, por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para poder cubrir esta necesidad escolar.
Planea pagar el crédito con una parte del sueldo que recibe de su empleo ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para la familia. 
Desea que sus hijos tengan la educación y el estudio necesario para un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Eleazar is requesting a loan to pay for school fees and expenses for his two children.
He needs to pay for their registration and to buy equipment such as notebooks, books and folders, and at the moment he does not have the money he needs to pay for these school supplies.
He plans to repay the loan with a part of the salary he earns with his job, his source of income for his family.
He wants his children to study and to get the necessary education to have a better future.

loans.use: To pay for registratio fees, school fees and to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Prudencia

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Prudencia; tiene 48 años de edad,  la socia es casada;  la socia tiene 2 hijos de 21, 18  años de edad;  La socia se dedica a la venta de emolientes, la socia tiene una carreta acondicionada para llevar todos sus productos y vender a partir de las 6 de la tarde en la esquina principal de sus barrio emolientes, la socia vende mates elaborados a base de hierbas medicinales que alivian o desinflaman los órganos, la socia cree fielmente en el alivio de sus mates hechos a base de hierbas naturales como linaza, cebada, airampo, limón, cola de caballo, y otras raíces de plantas medicinales usadas desde siempre en nuestro País. La socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de hierbas naturales  y en la compra de vasos para implementar su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de hierbas naturales y de vasos para el negocio.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Prudencia is a member of the Communal Bank “Fraternidad de Urubamba” (Brotherhood of Urubamba) which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 48 years old, married, and has two children (ages 21 and 18). Prudencia sells emollients (hot beverages made with herbs). She has a cart that is used for carrying all of her products. Prudencia starts selling emollients at 6pm in the main square of her neighborhood. Among the products she sells are “mates” made from medicinal herbs that alleviate inflamed organs. Prudencia is a true believer in the curative properties of beverages made with natural ingredients such as linseed, barley, cactus seeds, lemon, horsetail, and other medicinal plants that are frequently used in Peru. Prudencia wants to invest in the purchase of natural herbs and drinking glasses so that she can keep her business in operation. Therefore, she is requesting a loan for this purpose.

Prudencia is grateful for the support that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy natural herbs and drinking glasses for her business.

loans.name: Iris Anielka

texts.es: La señora Iris Anielka es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella tiene un negocio de pulpería,  por lo que tiene más de 6 años que se dedica a este negocio. Ella inicio debido a la necesidad de proporcionarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios. Ella tiene 2 hijos menores a su cargo, que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado proporcionarles estudios, alimentos y vestimenta. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, jugos, pan, detergentes y granos básicos. Desea ampliar su inventario aun más para ofrecerles a sus clientes una variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Sra. Iris Anielka is a hardworking woman who has managed a general store for more than six years. She started this business so that she could provide her family the necessary income. Iris has two young children under her care, so she invests great effort into providing for their education, food, and clothes.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy candy, soft drinks, juices, bread, detergent, and basic grains. She wants to increase her inventory even more so that she can offer her customers a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy candy, soft drinks, juices, bread, detergent, and basic grains.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel de Jesús, vive un barrio en donde tienen una iglesia muy hermosa, es soltero  y trabaja en el campo, sin embargo, ésta no es la unica actividad que practica, para obtener mas recursos se dedica a la realización de ropa y articulos de típicos de la region donde vive.

Él solito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materias primas, como son, mantas, hilos, agujas, botones, desde hace 15 años que él aprendio a realizar productos artesanales como camisas, servilletas, manteles bordados.

Él se inspiro su  familia para apoyar a sus padres en la  economía que se da del diario, en ello también quiere tener su propio dinero.

Su más grande ilusión es que con este préstamo pueda ir teniendo sus propios ahorros para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús lives in a neighborhood with a very beautiful church, he is single and he works in the fields. However, to make extra income, he also makes clothing and traditional cloth items that are typical of his region.

He requested a loan to invest in the purchase of raw materials such as blankets, threads, needles, and buttons. He has been engaged in this activity for fifteen years and things are going well: he sells shirts, napkins and embroidered tablecloths.

His family encouraged him, so that he would be able to help his parents pay for everyday expenses; he also wants to have money of his own.
His biggest dream is to be able to save money for himself thanks to this loan, thus improving his standard of living.

loans.use: To buy blankets, threads, needles and buttons.

loans.name: Micaela

texts.es:
La señora Micaela, vive en una comunidad muy bonita, en donde las personas son muy trabajadoras ya que practican el bordado de mantas, tiene a su responsabilidad un hijo de 19 años de edad.

    Ella solito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mantas e hilos para poder elaborar las camisas y bordarla, es esta actividad lleva unos años y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello ha tenido un buen ingresos con que ha sacado adelante a su familia.

     Su inspiración por esta  actividad inicio por su familia ya que sus padres también se dedicaban a  lo mismo  y fue como aprendió esta actividad.

    Lo que más desea es que con el préstamo y  su actividad pueda tener un mejor ingreso para ahorrar y seguir trabajando con su actividad.
texts.en:
Sra. Micaela lives in a beautiful community where the people are hard workers. They engage in the practice of making embroideries out of muslin. Micaela has a 19-year-son who is her responsibility.

She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of muslin and thread for making shirts and embroideries. Micaela has performed this activity for a few years and says that she has done very well. She earns a good income that enables her to move her family forward.

Her family inspired her to start this business since her parents also engage in the same line of work and were the ones her taught her this trade.

What she wants most out of this loan and her business is to earn a better income so that she can save and continue working in this activity.

loans.use: to buy muslin and thread for making shirts and embroideries.

loans.name: Concepcción

texts.es:
Concepción vive en  una localidad muy bonita en donde la mayoría de las personas se dedican al bordado de las mantas ya que es la cultura de su pueblo, ella es soltera  y tiene diecinueve años de edad.

     Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mercancía para surtir su tienda de abarrotes como son: azúcar frijol, aceite, huevo, galletas, entre otros, en esta actividad lleva cuatro  meses y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello ha tenido un buen ingreso.

     Su  motivo a esta actividad comenzó por si sola   para tener mejor ingreso en su familia, aun a si también se dedica a la compra de mantas e  hilos para bordar camisas y blusas.

    Lo que desea es que con esta actividad pueda mejorar su calidad de vida para que  así sus ahorros sean mejores y salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Concepción lives in a beautiful town where the majority of the people engage in the production of embroideries made of muslin, since this activity is part of the town’s culture. She is 29 years old and single.

Concepción is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise to restock her grocery store such as sugar, beans, oil, eggs, cookies, and other items. She has been in business for four months and says that she is doing well. Concepción earns a good income.

Her reason for starting this business was to generate more income for her family. She uses some of her income to purchase muslin and thread for making embroidered shirts and blouses.

What she wants from her business is the ability to improve her quality of life by acquiring more savings and moving forward.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to restock her grocery store.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.es:
La señora Anastasia  vive en una localidad en  la que las personas trabajan desde muy pequeñas, ella vive en unión libre con el señor Fabían y con quien procreo tres hijos que aun están a su responsabilidad.

    Ella  solicito  por segunda vez un préstamo y piensa invertirlo en la compra de frutas y verduras, ya que en este negocio lleva  muy poco tiempo y comenta que el va bien ya que con ello a tiene un buen ingreso en su actividad.

     Lo que la motivo a ello fue su esposo, ya que así los dos trabajan y así pueden tener  una mejor economía, para darles lo necesario a sus hijos que están creciendo.

      Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad pueda seguir  trabajando para que con el  tiempo  mejore su calidad de vida y también tener un lugar en donde pueda cosser las mantas, actividad que tambien practica.
texts.en:
Señora Anastasia lives in a town where people work from a very early age. She is in a common-law marriage with Señor Fabían and with whom she has 3 children, all minors. She is asking for a second loan and is thinking of using it to buy fruit and vegetables. As she has been in this business for only a short time, she says that it is going well as it gives her a good income. The reason for her starting the business was her husband as with the two of them working it meant more income. This means they can give their growing children what they need.

What she wants most of all is to continue to work in this small business so that with time their quality of life can improve and to have a place where she can sew blankets, another activity she practices.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María, es originaria de un lugar muy bonito en la que está muy orgullosa por la artesanía que tiene como tradición. Ella vive en unión libre con el señor Maximiliano con quien procreo una hija de tan solo tres años de edad.

     El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de pollos  de granja para venderlo  destazado  crudo y  asado en la  su misma localidad, a un así también  ella practica el bordado de mantas y comenta que con estas dos actividades le va muy bien   ya que ha mejorado su ingresos.

     Su inspiración por esta actividad de pollos comenzó por si sola  ya que desea tener un mejor ingresos para apoyar a su pequeña hija que esta creciendo y es su mas grande razón de trabajar para darle lo más necesario.

    Su más grande ilusión es que con sus ahorros pueda comprar una parrilla  más grande en donde pueda rostizar sus pollos y venda más.
texts.en: Señora María is originally from a very pretty place which prides itself on its traditional craftsmanship. She is in a common-law marriage with Señor Maximiliano with whom she has a daughter who is only 3 years old. The loan is to be invested in the purchase of free-range chickens which will later be sold quartered, raw and roasted on site. She also embroiders blankets and says that she is doing very well with the two businesses as her income has improved. The inspiration for starting the chicken business by herself was the desire to have a better income with which to support her young daughter who is growing. Her daughter is her biggest reason for working as she wants to give her all she needs. Her greatest hope is that with her savings she can buy a larger grill where she can roast her chickens and sell more.

loans.use: to buy chickens to later sell roasted

loans.name: Olga Maria

texts.es: Olga María tiene 29 años su actividad es un kiosco, que tiene cinco años de poseerlo, con un hijo d cuatro años bajo su cargo. La ubicación de su negocio es en un colegio público en donde ofrece sopa, pan, galletas, tajaditas, golosinas, bolsitas, churritos, jugos. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra d materia prima. Olga no ha terminado de estudiar su carrera universitaria  y con este kiosco ella esta logrando obtener ciertas ganancias para pagar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Olga Maria is 29 years old and she has had her own kiosk for the last 5 years. Olga has a 4-year-old son under her charge.  Her business is located in a public school where she offers soup, bread, cookies, fried plantain chips, sweets, stuffed pockets, Spanish-style deep fried dough, and fruit juices.

The reason for her loan request is to buy primary materials for her kiosk. Olga has not completed her university education as yet and with this kiosk, she is acquiring the earnings she needs to pay for her studies.

loans.use: to make soup, cookies, fried plantain chips, sweets, stuffed pockets, deep fried dough, and juices to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sweets to sell.

loans.name: Surriya's Group

texts.en:
Surriya is a very responsible lady in nature. She performs her household duties very well. She cooks food for her family and tries to give them comfort by fulfilling their needs. Her husband is a daily wage laborer. Surriya has given birth to two daughters and two sons. Two of them are attached to embroidery work and her youngest son is studying in class 5th.
 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son-in-law who is attached to a fruit selling business. With the loan, he will buy fresh seasonal fruits to put in his shop to sell. He is very fair in rates. That’s why he handles a good clientele base. He has been operating his business for the past four years and Surriya hopes that an investment will bring positive changes to his business and will improve his income. 

Note: In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Surriya.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal fruits to sell

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia de 48 años, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Edgar de 38 años y sus 03 queridos hijos quienes la inspiran para seguir trabajando arduamente.Celia, trabaja sus campos verdes con mucho ahínco, donde cultiva plantas tropicales de la amazonía peruana como: plátano, cacao y café productos que logró trabajarlos con mucha entrega para volverlos muy fructíferas. Celia viene labrando sus tierras desde sus 19 años y hoy es toda una conocedora de la ardua labor que se ejerce en el campo. En tiempos de cosecha y traslado de sus productos ella contrata peones para acelerar su trabajo, cabe mencionar a su amado Edgar quien es su mentor  y sostén para el progreso de su labor. Ha Celia le gusta lo que hace por que gracias a sus cosechas adquirió mas espacios de terreno para cultivar.Celia solicita el crédito para mejorar sus tierras y volverlas muy fructíferas, razón por la cual acude a los prestamos que MFP facilita y con el préstamo solicitado comprará abonos y estiércol de animales para  mejorar su producción.Mas adelante para el bien de su economía comprará más tierras y sembrará más plantas nativas de la selva.Este será su sexto crédito y se siente muy contenta de  saber que contara con el apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados.Con el monto solicitado comprará varios sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Celia, age 48, is from the city of Quimbiri.  She lives in her own house with her life partner, 38 year old Edgar, and their three beloved children.  The children inspire her to continue to work arduously, and she diligently works her green fields.  She grows tropical plants from the tropical Peruvian Amazon.  She grows bananas, cacao, and coffee.  She managed to make these crops very successful; it took a great deal of determination.

Celia has been working her fields since she was 19 years old.  Now she is an expert on the arduous work exercised in the field.  During harvest and transport times she hires workers to accelerate her work.  It should be noted that her beloved Edgar is her adviser and her support for the progress of her work.  Celia likes what she does because, thanks to her harvests, she got more land to cultivate.

Celia is requesting the loan to improve her land to make it very fruitful.  That is the reason she turns to the loans that MFP facilitates.  She will use the requesed loan to buy fertilizer and animal manure to improve her production.  Later, for the good of her finances, she will buy more land and plant more native jungle plants.

This will be her sixth loan.  She is very happy to know that she can count on the financial support.  This way she will be sure to buy what she has requested.  She is prepared to make her payments punctually. She will use the loan to buy various sacks of fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy various sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: María de Jesús se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, hace más d cinco años que tiene este negocio María siempre a sido una mujer luchadora pues siempre a salido con sus hijos adelante, la manera en que distribuye sus productos de manera ambulante ya que así obtiene nuevos clientes. Este crédito lo solicita con fin de comprar pantalones, camisa, faldas, calzados, perfumes, cremas y bolsos. Ella tiene la meta de ampliar su inventario para obtener más ingreso.
texts.en:
María de Jesús sells general merchandise.  She has had this business for over five years.  María has always been a tenacious woman.  She has always gotten her children ahead.

She distributes her products in an itinerant manner.  That is the way that she gets new customers.

She is requesting this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, shoes, perfume, creams, and purses.  Her goal is to increase her inventory in order to get more income.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, shoes, perfume, creams, and purses.

loans.name: Idalia Dominga

texts.es:
La señora Idalia es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos bajo su responsabilidad y a sus padres que son ya persona de edad avanzada y están enfermos. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar los gastos escolares de sus hijos, ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para poder comprar los útiles escolares que son cuadernos, lápices, libros, colores y las mochilas, pagar la inscripción para que puedan estudiar. 
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y padres, ya que es la responsable en los gastos familiares. 
Doña Idalia trabaja en las oficina del gobierno en el departamento de limpieza, con este ingreso planea pagar el crédito.
texts.en: Señora Idalia is a single mother. She is responsible for her two children and her parents who are elderly and sick. She is asking for a loan to pay for her children's school fees as she does not have enough money to buy school supplies such as notebooks, pencils, books, coloring pencils and backpacks and also pay the school fees. She wants to improve her children's and her parents' quality of life as she is the one responsible for the family expenses. Doña Idalia works in a government office, in the sanitation department, and she plans to use her salary to pay off the loan.

loans.use: to pay for school fees and buy school supplies.

loans.name: Hellen Tatiana

texts.es: Hellen Tatiana, tiene la edad 30 de años, está casada y vive con sus 2 hijos y esposo actualmente. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal. Ella comprara todo lo necesario para surtir su cafetal y tenerlo en condiciones favorables. Ella cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación y sembrado ya desde varios años atrás. Ella quiere darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y así poder ayudarle a su esposo a tener mayor facilidad con las responsabilidades de su hogar. Trabajando juntos, Hellen y su esposo Edgardo quieren generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar y seguir adelante con su proyecto. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Helen y Edgardo no habían tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo a Helen con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Hellen Tatiana is 30 years old, married, and lives with her 2 children and present husband. With this loan she intends to buy the inputs needed to supply her grove of coffee trees. She plans to buy everything she needs for her trees and to maintain them in favorable condition. 

Hellen has had appropriate terrain for cultivating and planting coffee trees for many years now. She wants to offer her children a better quality of life and, also, to make it easier for her husband to provide  for the responsibilities of the home. Working together, Hellen and her husband Edgardo want to generate the largest possible earnings for their well-being and to continue ahead with her project.

This is Hellen's first loan through FUDECOSUR. Hellen and Edgardo have not had previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered her this loan with all facilities and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: buy inputs for the maintenance and improvement of her coffee trees.

loans.name: Giovanni

texts.es: Giovanni, tiene la edad 43 de años, está casado y vive con sus 2 hijos y esposa actualmente. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono y todo lo necesario para asistir su cafetal. El cuenta con el área de café ya establecida en producción y en un buen estado de producción. El lo que quiere es darle a su cafetal los nutrientes necesarios para así obtener de este los mejores resultados del mismo. El quiere generar el maximo de ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y de su proyecto cafetalero para salir adelante con sus proyectos a largo plazo establecidos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Giovanni is 43 years old; he is married and currently lives with his two children and his wife.  He is planning on buying supplies with the loan to help with his coffee plantation.  What he specifically wants to buy is manure and everything he needs to help his coffee plantation.  He has an area that is already established for coffee production, and has a good level of production.  What he wants is to give his coffee plantation the necessary nutrients to be able to obtain the best results.  He wants to generate the maximum earnings for the well-being of his family and of his coffee plantation, so as to move ahead with his long-established plans.

This is the first loan that he has received through FUDECOSUR.  He hadn't taken any other loans previously from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to help with his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Rukhsana's Group

texts.en:
Rukhsana has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her business sewing clothes. She is very skillful in her art and knows about the latest trends in clothing. With the loan, she will buy another sewing machine and will hire an assistant to facilitate more clients and earn more income. She is the mother of three children. Two of her children are enrolled in a local school and getting their education. Besides her business, she also carries out her responsibilities of a housewife very well. She is hopeful that her sewing business will be improved after the loan investment.
 
Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Rukhsana.

loans.use: To buy another sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Don Felipe, es casado y vive en un barrio en donde el barrio tiene una capilla especialmente del santo San Sebastian, el es casado con la señora Felipa y a su responsabilidad  tiene a un hijo.

   El  trabaja en campo y solito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ropas para después venderlo en  las comunidades cercanas de su localidad, en esta actividad lleva  cinco años y nueve meses y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello tuvo un buen ingresos para sostener a su familia.

  Para dedicarse a este negocio se inspiro por si solo así tener un  mejor ingreso y tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia que es lo más importante para él.

   Lo que  desea es que  con el préstamo y su actividad mejore sus ingresos  y pueda tener sus propios a horros.
texts.en: Don Felipe is married and lives a neighbourhood which has a special chapel dedicated to Saint San Sebastian. He is married to Señora Felipa and has child under his care. He works in the fields and is asking for the loan in order to buy clothes. He plans to sell them later in the communities near his neighbourhood. He has been doing this for the last 5 years and 9 months and says that it is going well as it gave him a good income  with which to support his family. He decided to start up the business on his own in order to have a better income and give his family a better quality of life which is most important for him. He hopes that with the loan and his work he can improve his income and have his own savings.

loans.use: to buy clothes for later sale in the neighbourhood and other neighbourhoods nearby.

loans.name: Ildephonse

texts.fr:
Ildephonse est né au Rwanda et a 27 ans. Il est marie, il a 2 enfants de 1 an à 5 ans. Son niveau d’éducation est 3 ans de primaire. 
Ildephonse est agriculteur et commerçant des bananes. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des bananes en gros pour les revendre.
Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’élargir son business en élevant son capital et de louer et une camionnette pour les distributions des bananes. Ildephonse voudrait devenir un grand distributeur des bananes et faire commerce comme profession, et il voudrait améliorer le bien être de sa famille et scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ildephonse was born in Rwanda and is 27 years old. He is married and has two children, ages 1 and 5 years old. He has a 3rd grade education. 

Ildephonse is a farmer and sells bananas. This loan cycle is his first one with ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy bananas wholesale to resell. His strategy for business growth is to expand his business by increasing his capital and renting a truck for distributing bananas. 

Ildephonse would like to become a major distributor of bananas and to work professionally in commerce. And he would like to improve his family's well-being and to educate his children.

loans.use: to buy bananas wholesale to resell

loans.name: Nicolás Rene

texts.es: Nicolás Rene tiene su negocio que es el servicio d brindar transporte uno  de sus mayores desafío a sido que tiene mucha competencia, pero Nicolás siempre le brinda a sus clientes un buen servicio, otros  de los problemas es el precio del combustible ya que no es muy estable ya que esto le genera poca ganancia. Nicolás sueña tener otro taxi para obtener más ganancias. El crédito es para la compra llantas y baterías.
texts.en:
Nicolás Rene has a business which is providing transport services.  One of his biggest challenges has been that there is a lot of competition, but Nicolás always provides his customers with good service.  Another problem is the price of fuel, as it is not very stable and he generates minimal earnings.

Nicolás dreams of having an additional taxi to generate more earnings.  The loan is to buy tires and batteries.

loans.use: to buy tires and batteries.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María vive en una localidad que está cerca de un lugar llamado tapa lapa, en ese lugar celebran una fiesta el mes de  abril, y lo hacen en grande. Ella es casada y a su responsabilidad tiene  tres hijos.

    Ella es ama de casa y se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz para venderlo en la mismas localidad y en las comunidades cercanas, en esta actividad lleva un año y nueve meses y cometa que el va bien  ya que con ello a tendido un buen ingresos para a su familia.

    Lo que lo motivo ha esta actividad fue su propia familia para así apoyar a su esposo a darle lo más necesario a sus tres hijos que están creciendo.

     Lo que más desea es que con ello pueda mejorar  su calidad de vida aun así también  desea que con ello logre  tener sus ahorros y con el tiempo tener un lugar para almacenar el maíz.
texts.en:
Señora María lives in an community near to a place called Tapa Lapa, where they celebrate a big festival in the month of April.  She is married, and is responsible for three children.

She is a housewife, and works buying and selling corn, which she sells in her area and the surrounding communities.  She has been doing this for one year and nine months, and comments that it's going well, and that from it she has earned a good income for her family.

Her motivation in this activity has been her own family, in order to help her husband give her three growing children the things they most need.

What she most desires is to improve her quality of life through her work.  She also wants to be able to make some savings through her work, and with time to have somewhere she can store the corn.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase of corn and beans to sell later on in the same place.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
La señora Gabriela es casada y vive en la localidad muy bonita en donde la gente se dedica a trabajar todo el tiempo en el campo a la siembra de  maíz, frijol, para tener sus propios ingresos.

    Ella se dedica a su hogar y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mercancía para surtir su tienda de abarrotes, como son; azúcar, frijol, aceite, galletas, jabón, avena, entre otros, en esta actividad lleva practicando cinco meses y comenta que le va bien.

    Lo que lo motivo a esta actividad fue su familia ya que quiere tener una mejor calidad de vida, trabajando con algo que le deje ingresos y pueda apoyar también a su esposo quien trabaja en el campo.

     Lo que más desea es que con el préstamo que le han estado otorgando pueda seguir incrementado mas su actividad continuar trabajando con su actividad que tanto le está apoyando.
texts.en:
Gabriela is married and lives in a very pretty place where the people spend all of their time working in the countryside cultivating corn and beans to earn a living.

Gabriela has a home-based business, and she is requesting a loan to invest in merchandise to stock her grocery store, such as: sugar, beans, cooking oil, cookies, soap, oatmeal and other items.  She has been doing this work for 5 months, and she says that it is going very well.

Her family was the motivation for her to start this business, because she wants to have a better quality of life by doing something that brings in income and allows her to support her husband, who is a farmer.

What she wants most is to expand her store with the loan that has been granted to her, and to continue with this type of work, which is providing her with so much support.

loans.use: to pay for merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Zahida's Group

texts.en:
Zahida is the mother of five children, four of whom are enrolled in a local school. She plans to send the youngest child, who is only five years old, to school next year.
Zahida is a very supportive woman, who makes artificial jewelry to earn an income for the family. She is very skillful and receives a good number of orders every month. She makes bracelets and neck chains by using colorful beads. Her collection of jewelry attracts many customers and allows her to earn a profit. Zahida's husband is a rickshaw driver. He provides transport services to passengers and schoolchildren. 
Zahida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, to repair her husband's rickshaw. With the loan, he will buy a new rickshaw body and some spare parts, which will not only help him to save his business asset but also keep it running smoothly. Zahida is very confident that her husband will be able to provide better transport services to his passengers after repairing the rickshaw and that it will result in more income for him.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw body and spare parts

loans.name: Aracelly Del Carmen

texts.es: Aracelly del Carmen tiene 40 años su actividad es brindar el servicio d salón d belleza, tiene dos hijos menores d edad a su cargo de ocho y dieciséis años respectivamente, pues ella les ha enseñado a ganarse el pan de cada día con este negocio. Con este crédito lograra comprar tratamientos, tintes, pinturas de uñas, cepillo, peines, planchas, tijeras. La ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda pues la mayoría saben del buen servicio que ofrece.
texts.en:
Aracelly del Carmen is 40 years old, and her work is providing beauty salon services.  She has two young children in her care, aged 8 and 16 respectively, and through this business, she has taught them to earn their daily bread.

With this loan, she will be able to buy treatments, dyes, nail polish, brushes, combs, straightening irons and scissors.

The location of her business is in her home, as most people know the good service that she provides.

loans.use: to buy treatments, dyes, nail polish, brushes, combs, straightening irons and scissors.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La señora Julia vive en un lugar muy lindo donde la gente de su barrio es de una sola religión, en esta  localidad la gente sigue muy cerca su tradición y comenta que no lo dejaran de practicar.

    Ella es ama de casa y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra  de  productos naturales. como son: incienso de madera,recinas de copal, raises de plantas medicinales , entre otros, en donde lleva cuarenta  años practicandolo y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello ha tenido un mejor ingreso y a sacado adelante a su  familia.

    Lo que  lo  motivo a esta actividad fue su familia ya que fue madre de siete hijos quien afortunadamente ya todos están casados  y esta muy orgullosa de cada uno de ellos, pues la poyan con  ingresos y no le haga falta lo mas necesario.

    Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad pueda  seguir trabajando hasta que dios  le preste vida, así también que las sigan apoyando con el préstamo.
texts.en:
Julia lives in a beautiful place where the people in her neighborhood are all of the same religion. In this place the people follow their traditions very closely, and say they will not abandon it. 

Julia is a homemaker and is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of natural products which she has done for many years. The products include: wood incense, copal resin, and medicinal roots, among other things. He has been in this business for 40 years and says that she does well and that she has had a better income and has given her family a better life. 

Her motivation for this business was her family; Julia is the mother of seven children, all of whom are fortunately already married, and she is very proud of every one of them. 

What Julia wants most is to continue working at this small business for as long as God gives her life and that she gets continued support from this loan.

loans.use: to buy natural products and medicines.

loans.name: Pathani's Group

texts.en:
Pathani has four children, two of whom study while two are illiterate. She was not able to provide education for all of her children due to financial constraints. Pathani is a housewife who spends her time staying at home and carrying out her household responsibilities. Her husband has been operating an agriculture business for the past ten years. 
Pathani has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for the further expansion of her husband’s agriculture business. With the loan, he will buy seeds and fertilizers to get a better output from his efforts growing wheat and other seasonal crops. Pathani is hopeful that with the help of an investment, her husband will be able to increase his profits and her family will be able to enjoy a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her husband's agriculture business.

loans.name: Salama Group A

texts.en:
Dorothy is a facilitator for the Salama A group, in Chwele.  She and her co-group members have been members of One Acre Fund since 2009.  

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important farming inputs to distribute to Dorothy and her group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. 

Salama A Group is comprised of six women and one man.  Dorothy joined One Acre Fund in order to access the best input prices, grow enough to feed her family, have access to quality seed and fertilizer, have more harvest profits to invest in education, and be able to plant early thanks to on-time input delivery. 

In last year’s maize harvest, Dorothy reports harvesting seven bags of maize on ½ acre, an excellent harvest by her measure, and a much larger yield than the 2 2/3 bag yield that she harvested before investing in an input loan from One Acre Fund. 

Dorothy plans on spending her income from the upcoming harvests on school fees for her children, saving for the future, buying clothing for the family, taking care of her parents, and livestock investments.  

In the upcoming 2012 season, Salama Group A members will plant a total of seven acres of land, each farmer planting between ½ and 5 acres.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: La Guadalupita Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama La Guadalupita, está conformado por las señoras Anselma, Edith Maribel y Maricela van a comprar maíz por carga, la señora Magnolia va a comprar queso, jitomate, chiles, tortillas, masa, manteca y arroz, la señora María Concepción va a compra hojas para tamal, maíz, manteca, carne, verduras, la señora Josefina va a comprar leña por carga, la señora Deunila Martina va a comprar paletas, chicles, chocolates,  caramelos, la señora María Guadalupe va a comprar semilla y abono para cultivar ejote, la señora Marcelina va a compra refrescos por caja. La señora josefina tiene 66 años de edad, ella vende leña, servilletas, hilos y dulces, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar leña, servilletas, hilos para tejer y dulces, ella inicio su negocio hace 3 años, cuando quedo viuda y por falta de recursos economicos, su hijo le dio $ 1,000.00 y los invirtió en dulces y gelatinas su negocio está en su casa, también va a las plazas a vender sus servilleta e hilos para tejer, su negocio es importante porque tiene trabajo y le va dejando ingresos para la comida, a ella le gusta vender se distrae y se siente contenta ser útil y tener sus propios ingresos, ella está contenta con este préstamo que va a recibir porque la están apoyando a seguir trabajando en su negocio para tenerlo bien surtido. Sus sueños y esperanzas son ponerle techo a su casa y que Dios la conserve sana y que no se enferme. Las integrantes del grupo les dan las gracias a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad por sus apoyos, cada una de las integrantes va a emprenden el negocio en lo que les gusta trabajar.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is called "La Guadalupita".  It is made up of the Señoras Anselma; Edith Maribel; Maricela, who will buy corn by the load; Señora Magnolia, who will buy cheese, tomatoes, chili peppers, tortillas, dough, butter and rice; Señora María Concepción, who will buy leaves for tamales, corn, butter, meat, and vegetables; Señora Josefina who will buy firewood by the load; Señora Deunila Martina who will buy ice-pops, chewing gum, chocolates and caramels; Señora María Guadalupe who will buy seeds and manure to grow beans; and Señora Marcelina who will buy crates of sodas.

Señora Josefina is 66 years old.  She sells firewood, napkins, yarn and sweets.  She is requesting her loan to buy firewood, napkins, yarn for weaving and sweets.  She started her business three years ago, when she became widowed and lacked economic resources.  Her son gave her $1,000, which she invested in sweets and jellies.  Her business is in her home, and she also go to the plaza squares to sell her napkins and yarn for weaving.  Her business is important,  because she has work and it provides income so she can eat.  She enjoys working as it is a distraction, and she is happy to be useful and to earn her own income.  She is happy about this loan that she is going to receive, because it will be helping her to continue working in her business by keeping it well stocked.

Her dreams and hope are to put a roof on her house, and that God will keep her healthy and she won't get sick.

The members of the group give thanks to Kiva and to the Fundación Realidad for their help.  Each one of the members will undertake the business in which they enjoy working.

loans.use: to buy firewood, napkins, yarn for weaving and sweets.

loans.name: Flor De Azar Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Flor de Azar está integrado por la señora Araceli va a comprar con su préstamo ropa de dama, caballero y niños, la señora Angélica va a comprar masa, queso, crema, pollo, carne para preparar sus dobladas, la señora Laura va a comprar hilos y aceite para sus maquinas de coser, la señora Julieta va a comprar dulces paletas, caramelos y chicharrones, la señora Karla va a comprar ropa para niños, blusas, pantalones, ropa interior para dama, la señora Guadalupe va a comprar pollo por mayoreo, la señora Marcelina va a comprar platos, tinas, cucharas, cubetas, sartenes, el señor Antonio de Jesús va a comprar abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas para su siembra de sorgo.  El señor Antonio de Jesús tiene 26 años de edad, el vive en unión libre con su esposa, ella trabaja de empleada, ellos tienen una niña de 4 años de edad, ellos viven en una comunidad rural hay campo, cerros y las personas son amables, el tiene su siembra de sorgo, el solicito su préstamo para comprar abono y fertilizante para su siembra de sorgo, el inicio su negocio hace 2 años es herencia de su papa, él le esta enseñado a cultivar el sorgo,  su negocio es importante porque es fuente de ingresos para la familia, el se siente orgulloso de seguir con la tradición de la familia, de trabajar las tierras con sus papas y sus hermanos, el utiliza las ganancias reinvirtiendo y para el sostén de la familia, sus sueños y esperanzas son hacer un invernadero para producir jitomate, tomate y pepino y tener junto con su familia un mejor nivel de vida. Los integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les damos las gracias por tenernos confianza y de ayudarnos en nuestros negocios, gracias por contribuir a que tengamos una mejor calidad de vida junto con las familias”.
texts.en:
This solidarity Group is called Flor de Azar and is made up of the following members and their plans for their loans:

 Sra. Araceli, who is going to buy clothing for men, women and children; Sra. Angélica who is going to buy dough, cheese, cream, chicken and beef to prepare her dobladas [folded and fried tortillas filled with meat or cheese, etc.]; Sra. Laura who is going to buy thread and oil for her sewing machines; Sra. Julieta who is going to buy sweets, Popsickles, candy and chicharrones [pork rinds]; Sra. Karla who is going to buy children’s clothing and women’s blouses, pants and underwear, Sra Guadalupe who is going to buy chickens wholesale, Sra Marcelina who is going to buy plates, tubs, spoons, buckets and skillets and Sr. Antonio de Jesús, who is going to buy fertilizar and pesticidas for his sorghum planting.

Antonio de Jesús is 26 and lives with his common-law wife, who is employed. They have a 4-year-old daughter and live in a rural community where there are hills and fields and people are friendly. He has his planting of sorghum and started his business two years ago through an inheritance from his father, who is teaching him how to cultivate sorghum.

His business is important because it is the source of income for his family. He is proud of following his family’s tradition and of working the land with his parents and siblings. He will use the profits to reinvest and to support his family.
